Description:
Circle of Light Mastodon server is open for anyone who values humanism, equity, secular ethics, and scientific method. Our goal here is to grow a safe, caring, and sustainable global community.

We recognize that freedom of speech sometimes comes into conflict with public safety and people's right to pursue happiness. We believe that a safe space for self-expression is only possible when it is actively protected from harm. To protect this community from harm, we reserve the right to err on the side of safety rather than freedom of speech in our content moderation decisions.

We recognize that being able to volunteer unpaid labor is a privilege, and we do not want to exclude people who cannot afford that privilege from contributing to the site operations and content moderation for this community. To sustain operation of this server and the work of content moderators, we encourage you to donate.

You can support us in several ways:

  • Open Collective
  • Ko-Fi
  • Stripe: $1/month, $10/year, $10/month, single donation, manage your subscription

Watch this space for upcoming quarterly financial reports.

Moderation

Use the Mastodon Report menu option to flag content and accounts that violate our server rules. Other ways to reach moderators (e.g. emailing or tagging server admins) are difficult to track and are likely to be missed or ignored.

If you don't have a Mastodon account and have a problem with anything on this server, your next best option is sending an email to abuse@circle.lt.

Moderation for content in languages our moderators can't use is best effort only. As we grow our moderators team, adding more languages will be a priority. Currently supported languages are: Belarusian, English, Ukrainian.

Operations

This server is hosted in the United States. Current footprint: 5 VMs, 14 CPUs, 28GB RAM total. Watch this space for upcoming blog post documenting our setup, and for links to the source code of our deployment configuration.

Governance

Circle of Light is a California LLC founded and fully owned by Dmitry Borodaenko.

Decisions are made based on rough consensus of all recognized Circle of Light contributors, escalated to formal consensus of all contributors by request of any two or more contributors, or to a Condorcet ranked ballot vote by all paying subscribers by request of 10% or more of the paying subscribers. Circle of Light founder Dmitry Borodaenko can veto any decision.
Short: Circle of Light Mastodon server is open for anyone who values humanism, equity, secular ethics, and scientific method. Our goal here is to grow a safe, caring, and sustainable global community.

Description:
Welcome to this Mastodon server! We are a community of Detroit Red Wings fans looking for a positive place to discuss the team and related topics. To ensure that everyone has a positive and enjoyable experience on our server, we have established the following rules of conduct.

Be respectful and considerate of others. This means no hate speech, harassment, or discrimination of any kind.

Keep the conversation appropriate for all ages, within reason. This means no explicit or graphic content that is not suitable for a general audience. Do not spam or engage in malicious activity. This includes bot spam, phishing attempts, and other harmful behavior.

Follow the law. This includes not sharing illegal or copyrighted material.

Use common sense and good judgment. If you're not sure if something is appropriate, ask a moderator or administrator. We're not here to be tyrants, we just want everyone to have a good time.

We reserve the right to remove any content or accounts that violate these rules, or that we deem harmful to the community. We also reserve the right to modify these rules as necessary. If you have any questions or concerns, please contact a moderator or administrator.

Thank you for being a part of our community!
Short: Unofficial fan moderated server for positive discussion about the Detroit Red Wings.

Regeln

Da "Geht gut miteinander um" einfacher gesagt als getan ist, haben wir eine (nicht vollstÃ¤ndige) Liste von Verhaltensweisen aufgestellt, die zu einer LÃ¶schung von Toots und zu einer Blockierung von Accounts fÃ¼hren kÃ¶nnen, wenn die Probleme fortbestehen. Insbesondere tolerieren wir nicht:

  • BelÃ¤stigung, Stalking, Doxxing
  • Verbreitung von VerschwÃ¶rungstheorien und/oder deren BefÃ¼rwortung
  • Rassismus, Sexismus, Beschimpfungen oder deren BefÃ¼rwortung
  • Diskriminierung von Geschlechtern und sexuellen Minderheiten oder deren BefÃ¼rwortung
  • GewalttÃ¤tige nationalistische Propaganda, Nazi-Symbolismus oder FÃ¶rderung der Ideologie des Nationalsozialismus
  • Leute kontaktieren, die klar gemacht haben, dass sie keinen Kontakt wollen. Dogpiling
  • Nicht markierte Werbung
  • Nicht getaggte oder automatisierte oder Ã¼bermÃ¤ÃŸige Werbung
  • sexueller Inhalt oder Gewaltdarstellungen
  • Bots, die ohne ihre expliziten Anfragen mit Nutzer interagieren
Bitte melden Sie Verhalten, das Sie stÃ¶rt. Das schlieÃŸt Verhalten von anderen Instanzen mit ein - wir sind sehr gerne bereit, mit Asshole-Instanzen die Verbindung zu unterbrechen.

Rules

Since "Be excellent to each other" is much easier said than done, we have a (non-exhaustive) list of behaviours that may lead to deletion of toots, and silencing or suspension of accounts, if problems persist. In particular, we do not tolerate:

  • Harrassment, stalking, doxxing
  • Racism, sexism, verbal abuse or advocation thereof
  • Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof
  • Violent nationalist propaganda, Nazi symbolism or promoting the ideology of National Socialism
  • Contacting people who made clear they want no contact. Dogpiling/brigading
  • Untagged advertisement
  • Untagged, or automated, or excessive advertisement
  • sexual content or gore
  • Bots interacting with users without their explicit requests
Please report behaviour that bothers you. That includes behaviour from other instances - we are very willing stop federating with asshole instances.

Donations

I run mustel.id as a free service because I like Mastodon, but it costs me money, and the cost will rise as more people join! If you'd like to donate towards the running costs you can contribute by buying me a coffee.

Moderation

Moderation of this server is based on interpretation of content posted to the server against our published rules. Use of the server can be withdrawn at the administrator's discretion.
Short: mustel.id: for mustelids, by mustelids.

Description:
You have found Ed's Mastodon Server. This site and its services are unsafe and should not be used by anyone. This instance is only hosted for myself and maybe a few friends.

Disclaimer: This service is hosted for learning and experimental purposes only. In general, I do my best to keep this service secure and reliable, but there may be bugs and I may stop hosting this service at anytime without warning.

Mastodon is basically an opensource and decentralized (federated) Twitter clone. If I know you and you are interested in giving Mastodon a try, please get a hold of me and I can help setup an account for you.

I do not and cannot administer or moderate federated servers as they are owned and operated by someone else. By the nature of federation, federated servers may keep a copy of anything you publish even if you delete it from this server, so please assume everything on this server is public and permanent. There are mechanisms for this server to request federated servers to also delete your content, but federated servers may not honor this request. If an account or server is found to be abusive, please report it and I will try my best to promptly block and wipe it from this instance.

This server will federate with other Mastodon servers allowing you to follow just about anyone on Mastodon even if they do not use my server. If you are looking for someone to follow, this Get Started Site and Fedi.Directory seem like good sites to browse popular accounts, but I have no association with (nor have even fully vetted) these sites.
Short: You have found Ed's Mastodon Server.  This site and its services are unsafe and should not be used by anyone.  This server is only hosted for myself and maybe a few friends.

Description:
The following is copied from mastodon.social and enforced here as if it was our own

The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of mastodon.social; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

  1. The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:
    1. Excessive advertising
    2. Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources
    3. Untagged nudity, pornography and sexually explicit content, including artistic depictions
    4. Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence, including artistic depictions
  2. The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:
    1. Racism or advocation of racism
    2. Sexism or advocation of sexism
    3. Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof
    4. Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism
  3. The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:
    1. Sexual depictions of children
    2. Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism
    3. Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism
  4. Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:
    1. Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.
    2. Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.
    3. Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.
Short: Mastodon for the Karagory-Cloud - Follows the Mastodon Covenant(https://joinmastodon.org/covenant)

Description:
Welcome to our vibrant server! This private haven operates as a sanctuary for friends and family. We take pride in being a diverse, queer, LGBTIQA+, and sex-positive community, with a strong inclination towards technology and innovation. Our members are encouraged to express themselves freely, embracing their true selves, even if that includes nudity.

Invitations to join our community can be requested through any of our friendly admins, or through mutual friends. As a close-knit community, we believe in the power of personal connections and shared values. Our rules are not just guidelines, but a reflection of the respect and understanding we have for each other.

We strive to maintain an environment that is not only respectful, but also enjoyable, fostering a sense of belonging and camaraderie. Each member contributes to the unique fabric of our community, making it a dynamic and inclusive space.

Thank you for being a part of our community, and for contributing to the rich tapestry of experiences and perspectives that make us who we are!
Short: Welcome to our private, tech-savvy server for friends and family. We are a queer, LGBTIQA+, and sex-positive community, encouraging free expression and respect. Invites can be requested through known admins. Thank you for being a part of our unique community!

Description:
We want this to be a fun, pleasant, and harassment-free experience for everyone, regardless of gender, gender identity and expression, sexual orientation, disability, physical appearance, body size, race, or religion. We do not tolerate harassment of participants in any form. Participants asked to stop any harassing behavior are expected to comply immediately. Always remember that logs from this Mastodon server may be subject to subpoena and could become public as part of legal proceedings. Harassment includes:

  • Offensive comments related to gender, gender identity and expression, sexual orientation, disability, mental illness, neuro(a)typicality, physical appearance, body size, race, or religion
  • Unwelcome comments regarding a person's lifestyle choices and practices, including those related to food, health, parenting, drugs, and employment.
  • Deliberate misgendering or use of 'dead' or rejected names
  • Gratuitous or off-topic sexual images or behavior in spaces where they're not appropriate
  • Simulated physical contact (e.g. textual descriptions like "hug" or "backrub") without consent or after a request to stop.
  • Threats of violence
  • Incitement of violence towards any individual, including encouraging a person to commit suicide or to engage in self-harm
  • Deliberate intimidation
  • Sustained disruption of discussion
  • Unwelcome sexual attention
  • Continued one-on-one communication after requests to cease
  • Publication of non-harassing private communication If you are being harassed, notice that someone else is being harassed, or have any other concerns, please contact a moderator. They will respond as promptly as they can.

We will respect confidentiality requests for the purpose of protecting victims of abuse. At our discretion, we may publicly name a person about whom we've received harassment complaints, or privately warn third parties about them. We will not name harassment victims without their affirmative consent. Participants asked to stop any harassing behavior are expected to comply immediately.

If a participant engages in harassing behavior, Jason or his representatives may take any action they deem appropriate, up to and including expulsion from this community and identifying the participant publicly as someone about whom we've received complaints. (This code of conduct is based on Annalee Flower Horne's Sample Slack Code of Conduct, which is in turn based on Geek Feminism's Community Anti-Harassment Policy. We have adapted the Sample Slack Code of Conduct for our own use under the terms of the Creative Commons Attribution License.) ï»¿

Description:
This is a private, invitation-only server.

I have decided that this should be a safe haven for anyone questioning their gender, trying to figure out who they really are and need a secondary account until they have discovered themselves.

If I know you and you are questioning your gender, please do ask me in a DM about an account. You can then use that account to anonymously discuss, muse, theorize, or in any other way try to express & understand your gender. Once you are done and you know who you are, you have to leave.

I only accept people who adhere to the principle of "Liberal Democratic Basic Order" (Freiheitliche demokratische Grundordnung) which indicates as its first principle: "The dignity of the human being is inviolable."

Use of Posts From This Server

You can read, respond, boosts, and perform any such activity as done on the Fediverse on posts/toots from this server.

However: any (commercial) use, regardless of whether you want to sell any content or whether you want to offer any service in which posts from this server are involved are STRICTLY FORBIDDEN. You may not, directly or indirectly, base your (commercial) business partly or wholly on the use of any post/toot, media, or data from this server.

Please note: all data on this server is covered by German Laws and especially the copyright is based on German "Urheberrechtsgesetz": this means, there is no "irrevocable right to use"! German "Urheberrechtsgesetz" doesn't know or accept "irrevocable". There is no such thing in German Law. The original creator can revoke such permission any time they deem you are misusing their content.

Also: if you receive consent from one user on this server to peruse one of their posts for commercial purposes, THIS DOES NOT MEAN ALL USERS AND/OR ALL POSTS. Consent is required for any commercial use of any data from this server for each data item separately.

Lastly: any scraping of content of any type from this server is strictly prohibited. You are only permitted to use content from this server for "Standard Fediverse Activities", such as reading, replying, starring, bookmarking, etc. Any copying of content from this server outside of "Standard Fediverse Activity" is strictly prohibited. And if you are unsure whether your intended use is "Standard Fediverse Activity", then it probably is NOT.

Crawling the content of the instance and creating a database of its posts and content for the purposes of archiving, searching, forwarding (such as bridging to a services like BlueSky, X, Meta-Services, etc, that are in one way or other operated for commercial purposes), copying, or analyzing is strictly prohibited.

And just to be clear: the admin of this server will never tolerate any misuse or unlicensed use of content/data from this server!

Emojis used on this server

Blobcat (CC0 license) by various artists

Blobhaj (CC BY-SA 4.0) by HeatherHorns

Neofox (CC BY-NC-SA 4.0 license) by Volpeon

Queercat (CC0) by ZoeBijl

Infinity Pride (CC-NC-SA license) by Rick Osborne

And a few others: - kpop.social - Pats (mostly by SymTrkl@anarres.family)

We are a micro self-hosted Mastodon instance

  • We are not open for registration, but we communicate normally with federation universe
  • We do not provide access to mainland China
  • We guarantee an annual availability of over 9.9%
  • We have no money, we are not funded by donations
  • If you want to support us, just follow me and you're good to go!

Service Information

  • Server: Oracle ARM Ampere Altra A1 Instance
  • Processor: ARM Neoverse N1@4Core
  • Physical Memory: 24GB
  • Harddisk: 150GB
  • OS: Debian GNU/Linux 11 (bullseye) aarch64
  • Container System: Docker CE v23.0.4 Docker Compose v2.17.2
  • Object Storage: Backblaze B2
  • Content Delivery Network: Cloudflare

Description:
My single-user server to access the Mastodon network.

This instance is hosted on an independent server with no redundancy. If you need an account it is advisable to register on bigger ones; if you need one here get in touch :)

The Smithtodon instance is owned and operated by Mark Smith of NJ who believes in the model that the Mastodon network implements. Mastodon uses small interconnected instances to create a giant interconnected microblogging network free of interstitial advertising and top-down control.

Mark has been on the Internet since 1987 and was on Bulletin Board Systems before that. Mastodon and the Fediverse have the same feel of BBSs, UseNet, and early Twitter.

Currently this site is run free for its users. If growth requires additional expenses we may request donations at some point.

This site was created in early 2023. It's Mark's intention to run the site for a number of years. Per Mastodon policy, at least 90 days notice will be provided to allow users to migrate to another instance.

This instance will be capped when we start to strain the current resources. It will be reopened once we are able.

Please send all questions to markrsmith@gmail.com or @markrsmith@smithtodon.org.
Short: A small server run by Mark Smith, a chaplain living in New Jersey, USA. Running for the benefit of its users.

Description:
UKGB Social is a social network platform based on the decentralized Mastodon protocol. It is designed to bring people from the UK together in a virtual space where they can interact and share their thoughts, opinions, and experiences with each other. This platform is unique in that it is specifically targeted towards those who are from the UK and can communicate effectively in the English language.

Mastodon, the software on which UKGB Social is built, allows for decentralized social networking, which means that there is no central authority controlling the platform. This creates a safe and secure environment for people to express themselves freely without fear of censorship or intrusion. Additionally, Mastodon provides greater privacy than other social networking sites because users can create private groups and direct message other users without worrying about third-party advertisers or data mining.

UKGB Social offers various features such as the ability to create a profile, follow other users, send and receive messages, and share multimedia content such as photos and videos. With these features, users can connect with like-minded individuals, join discussions, and stay informed about the latest news and events in the UK. Overall, UKGB Social is a welcoming community where individuals from the UK can come together to share their perspectives and experiences in a safe, secure, and inclusive environment.
Short: UKGB Social is a Mastodon instance aimed at individuals from the UK who speak English.

Description:
This Mastodon instance was started at the end of January 2023 by Adam Isacson, Director for Defense Oversight at the Washington Office on Latin America: @adam@elefanti.co. (Adam is speaking for himself here: opinions are not necessarily the vetted view of WOLA.)

Adam started this instance because he got tired of seeing what happens when we donâ€™t own our own spaces on the internet. Our social media presence should belong to us. Mastodonâ€™s federated structure allows that.

While this has been a one-person instance, perhaps it could grow into a space for advocates of human rights, arms control, peacebuilding, democracy, migration, environmental justice, racial justice, gender justice, LGBTQ+ rights, and similar work.

If that describes you, youâ€™re welcome to sign up for an account here. It would be fun to have a local timeline that we could all learn from.
Short: Founded in January 2023, this has been a one-person instance. But I'm open to letting it grow into a space for fellow advocates of human rights, democracy, peacebuilding, and justice.

Description:
ActivityPub is a protocol that allows different servers to communicate with each other in a decentralized way. Users can create, update, and delete content on one server and share it with other ActivityPub-enabled servers. Users can also follow and receive notifications and content from actors on other servers.

We hope that ActivityPub will foster a diverse and sustainable ecosystem of social networks that are run for the good of society rather than for profit.
Short:
Den's ActivityPub Server using GoToSocial

Community of enthusiasts who share information on topics such as technology, programming, artificial intelligence and decentralization.

We use ActivityPub, an open and decentralized social networking protocol that enables us to interact with other servers that support it. We can follow actors on other servers using ActivityPub and receive updates and content on topics that interest us.

Purpose and Scope: Small Circlez seeks to build a community focused on technology, the Fediverse, and related topics. Content relevant to these subjects is appreciated but, please, feel free to go with the flow of streams of consciousness where you wish.

Registration: Provide a valid email address and a brief introduction about your interest in technology or the Fediverse for moderator review. We believe in "Know Your Customer" to reduce spam and undesirable behavior.

Reporting: Report any content or behavior violating these rules to moderators for review and appropriate action.

Moderation: Moderators reserve the right to remove content or users violating rules and update or amend rules as needed.
Short: Circlez.Social seeks to help unlock the power of The Fediverse for a mass audience by supporting the builders and tinkerers who support Free and Open Source Software (FOSS).

Description:
purpose

A place lightly inspired around the theme of doodles and furry art! (but it's by no means a strict requirement.)

setup

The server is run using a modified docker-compose.yml, so it's all containerised! It sits behind a reverse-proxy (Nginx instance).

vague steps to re-create it are:

  1. cp .env.production.sample .env.production
  2. update .env.production to point to docker-compose networked shorthands (mastodon-db-1, mastodon-redis-1...)
  3. from web run /usr/bin/tini bundle exec rake secret to generate the secret variable
  4. from dbrun psql -U postgres then CREATE USER mastodon SUPERUSER LOGIN;
  5. from web run /usr/bin/tini bundle exec rake db:setup
  6. to make yourself an admin, from web run bin/tootctl accounts modify MY_USER --role Owner

SMTP / hosted mail server

Remember to update your .env.production to support SMTP

SMTP_SERVER=MY MAIL HOST SERVER
SMTP_PORT=MY PORT WITH SSL ON MAIL HOST, maybe 465?
SMTP_LOGIN=MY MAIL AS REGISTERED ON MAIL HOST
SMTP_PASSWORD=MY SECRET PASSWORD GENEREATED VIA MAIL HOST
SMTP_FROM_ADDRESS=MY FROM ADDRESS

SMTP_SSL=true
SMTP_ENABLE_STARTTLS_AUTO=true
SMTP_AUTH_METHOD=plain
SMTP_OPENSSL_VERIFY_MODE=none
SMTP_DELIVERY_METHOD=smtp


Nginx reverse-proxy

The relevant config for my nginx setup is the following.

map $http_upgrade $connection_upgrade {
    default upgrade;
    ''      close;
}
server {
    ...
    location / {
        proxy_set_header Host $host;
        proxy_set_header X-Real-IP $remote_addr;
        proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-For $proxy_add_x_forwarded_for;
        proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Proto $scheme;
        proxy_set_header Proxy "";
        proxy_buffering off;
        proxy_redirect off;
        proxy_http_version 1.1;
        proxy_set_header Upgrade $http_upgrade;
        proxy_set_header Connection $connection_upgrade;

        client_max_body_size 20M;
        proxy_pass http://127.0.0.1:3001;
    }
    ...
}

costs

The server is currently paid for out-of-pocket by @tegaki, if it grows too big a decision about future funding will be made... with announcements!

Currently it's cheaper to share host with other docker container apps, and the hardware it's running on is on the cheaper side, so if it gets slow in tandem with rising popularity that's probably why!

Description:
About psychotherapy.social

psychotherapy.social is run by the Society for Existential Analysis for their members and the wider psychotherapy community.

This site uses Mastodon with a community oriented add-on called Hometown. Mastodon makes up part of a federated social media network that removes control from corporations. There is more about Mastodon and Hometown, including tips for new users, towards the bottom of this page.

About the SEA

The Society for Existential Analysis (SEA) provides a forum for the expression of views and the exchange of ideas amongst those interested in the analysis of existence from philosophical and psychological perspectives.

The SEA was founded in 1988 by Emmy Van Deurzen to advance public education in the use and application of Existential Analysis, and foster and disseminate research into Existential Thought and Psychotherapy.

Members of the Society for Existential Analysis include students, counsellors, psychotherapists, psychologists, academics, philosophers and sympathisers, from the United Kingdom and abroad. The SEA welcomes anyone interested in the existence of human beings. While our events are open to everyone, our members enjoy discounts, free publications and advance information.

About Mastodon

A brief introduction

Mastodon is a somewhat Twitter-shaped part of a decentralised and federated social network collectively referred to as the "Fediverse". In short the Fediverse is a large collection of mostly community led social sites (called "instances") providing services similar to YouTube, Twitter or Instagram that interact with one another, so for example someone with an account on a Mastodon instance can follow anyone on any instance across the Fediverse, then see and interact with all videos, social media posts and images of anyone they're following as they're posted, from a single site or app.

Because this is collectively made up of mostly small and medium sized community led instances it is inherently friendlier. In the last 6 months the number of Mastodon users has grown from 4 million to more than 10 million, split across more than 20,000 instances.

The video below will help explain the main difference between Mastodon, and centralised social media sites like Twitter (and to some extent Facebook):

This video is embedded from a site called TILvids, itself a Fediverse instance using something called Peertube, this being a Fediverse YouTube equivalent.

Here are two sites that have their own starter guides and more tips that new users may find useful, as well as other information:

  • fedi.tips
  • mastodon.help

The difference with Hometown

Hometown adds a small number of changes to Mastodon that make it more community-oriented. This document will be updated as more differences from Mastodon are implemented. The basic differences are:

  1. Post length - Mastodon as standard has a 500 character limit on posts. This has been increased to 5000.
  2. Local-only posting - as standard Mastodon users can choose a number of levels of visibility on posts while using any Mastodon app or site (click the icon when posting to see options). With Hometown an extra level of visibility is added when using the site directly whereby users can choose whether to show posts to all users across the Fediverse, or restrict to other users on psychotherapy.social. Click the in the new post box on the site to see this option.
  3. Exclusive lists - In regular Mastodon, if you add an account to a custom list, posts from people on that list will still appear on your home timeline. With exclusive lists you have control over this behaviour.

Local-only posting & exclusive list management are not yet available through mobile apps, only through psychotherapy.social on a web browser. The increased post length is available on all major Mastodon apps.

Users with a single Mastodon account can use the official Mastodon app, if you have multiple accounts the best apps are Tusky for Android, or Toot! for Apple mobile devices ($3.99 currently).
Short: A Mastodon/Hometown instance run by the Society for Existential Analysis for their members, the wider psychotherapy community and those in associated fields.

Description: Pleroma: An efficient and flexible fediverse server

scuttle.cloud is part of the Mastodon network and is hosted in Finland by bitlevel. This is an invite only server.

If you already are a member of the scuttle.cloud community and have a valid account, you can use your credentials to log in to this instance.

The idea of a distributed social network based on open standards with no clear owner and no tracking or profiling of users and no algorithms that provide personalized content is a superb one.

Funding

This server is fully funded by bitlevel.

Description:
Reporting and moderation

\n

When reporting accounts, please make sure to include at least a few posts that show rule-breaking behaviour, when applicable. If there is any additional context that might help make a decision, please also include it in the comment. This is especially important when the content is in a language nobody on the moderation team speaks.

\n

We usually handle reports within 24 hours. Please mind that you are not notified when a report you have made has led to a punitive action, and that not all punitive actions are externally visible. For first time offenses, we may opt to delete offending content, escalating to harsher measures on repeat offenses.

Description:
"Welcome to TechHaven, the premier Mastodon server for tech enthusiasts and industry professionals. Here, we foster a thriving community where ideas ignite, connections are made, and innovation is at the forefront of every conversation.

What We Offer: - Dynamic Discussions: Engage in lively discussions on the latest in tech, from AI breakthroughs to cybersecurity trends. - Networking Opportunities: Connect with like-minded individuals, industry veterans, and rising stars in the tech world. - Learning and Development: Whether you're a seasoned pro or a curious newcomer, there's always something new to learn here. - Project Collaboration: Find collaborators for your next big project or contribute your skills to exciting ventures. - Resource Sharing: Access a wealth of resources, from cutting-edge research papers to practical guides on tech implementation.

TechHaven Highlights: - Regular Events: Join webinars, Q&A sessions with tech experts, and virtual meetups. - Safe and Inclusive Space: We prioritize creating a respectful and inclusive environment for all members. - Latest Tech News: Stay updated with curated news feeds and insightful commentary from our members. - Member Spotlights: Celebrate achievements and milestones within our community.

Who Should Join? - Tech professionals seeking to network and share expertise. - Hobbyists and enthusiasts passionate about technology. - Students and educators in the field of tech and digital studies. - Startups and entrepreneurs looking for insights and collaborations.

TechHaven Ethics: - We encourage respectful and constructive dialogues. - We uphold privacy and data protection principles. - We are committed to an ad-free and spam-free experience.

As President of Computer PRO Unltd, I, Josh Giesing, extend a warm invitation to join TechHaven. Here, your passion for technology will be right at home. Let's build a brighter digital future together!"
Short: "TechHaven: A Mastodon Community for Tech Enthusiasts and Professionals. Join us at TechHaven, where technology meets collaboration and innovation. Our server is a hub for tech enthusiasts, profession

Description:
Important!

Due to increased bot signups, manual approval is required. Please write some applicable request text on signup with why you want to join. Submissions that fail to do so will be denied.

This Mastodon instance is for all union members, their family members, and supporters of labor and labor rights.

Service Level Objective (SLO)

We aim to review new account requests every 2-4 hours throughout the day, but are likely to do less review during the United States overnight.

We aim to review all content reports ASAP, but ask that you give us at least 12 hours to respond, particularly overnight.

Code of Conduct

Short Version

We try to handle moderation ASAP, but we may not see reports for several hours. We will get to all reports though!

We're not a free speech absolutist, and there are instances available for that. We're not interested in Nazis, TERFS, or hate speech of any sort, which we will define at our sole discretion as moderators. No homophobia, transphobia, queerphobia, racism allowed.

This instance is meant to be a friendly, welcoming space to all who are willing to reciprocate in helping to create that environment.

Long Version

The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of union.sh; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

  1. The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:
    1. Excessive advertising
    2. Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources
    3. Untagged nudity, pornography and sexually explicit content, including artistic depictions
    4. Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence, including artistic depictions
  2. The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:
    1. Racism or advocation of racism
    2. Sexism or advocation of sexism
    3. Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof
    4. Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism
  3. The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:
    1. Sexual depictions of children
  4. Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:
    1. Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.
    2. Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.
    3. Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

Content Warnings and Sensitive Media

Our Content Warning (CW) policy is intended to make our server comfortable for our community. We are not trying to silence our community or police discussion, but ask that you consider those who may read your posts when making them.

Content Warnings are a feature of Mastodon that enable you to hide the body of a "toot" (post) behind a line of text. The intended use of this feature is to provide a way to discuss sensitive and/or potentially harmful topics without causing duress or harm to anyone who might stumble upon it, though content warnings may be used for a wide variety of reasons.

Images can be marked as sensitive. This is a feature which hides an image until a warning banner is clicked. Images may be marked as sensitive separately from Content Warnings, though using a Content Warning automatically marks the toot's images as sensitive.

We cannot enforce content warnings on users from other instances, but can help to manage content that you see when reported to instance moderators.

Please be clear and accurate when labeling content warnings, to ensure that they follow both the letter and spirit of the enforcements that we have.

Above all, try to be polite, and come from a place of mutual respect when discussing content warnings with other. We do not condone tone policing, and want to promote healthy discussion in our community.

This cannot ever be a complete list, and so we want to keep it semi-general, and reserve the right to use the judgement of the moderation team to make decisions in the future.

  • Enforced Content Warnings:
    • NSFW/sexual discussion and imagery must be behind descriptive CWs (nudity, sex, kink discussion, etc)
    • Sensitive imagery (please use your best judgement on what content that most other users would find sensitive, such as photos of surgeries, abuse, war, deceased individuals, etc)
  • Suggested Content Warnings:
    • Discussion of overtly political (relating to elected or unelected government officials) topics
    • Triggering topics (direct discussion of rape, trauma, abuse, suicide, transphobia, homophobia, etc). The intention is to provide a warning for users who may not want to consume this content, not to silence users who are sharing their negative experiences.
    • Drugs or drug use
    • Advertisements for corporations
    • "Rage" posts and posts using mainly capital letters
  • Suggested Sensitive Image Marking
    • Eye contact images
    • Food related images

CryptoCurrency/NFTs

We do not allow the promotion, advertisement, or sale of cryptocurrencies on our instance. Mentioning the existence of cryptocurrencies, linking personal accounts or addresses, and otherwise discussing them in a way that is not intended to sell or advertise a specific cryptocurrency is acceptable. We do not have any association with any cryptocurrency or other monetary transactions that happen within the server.

We do not allow the promotion, advertisement, or sale of NFTs on our instance. We do not allow content from our instance, including content and media uploaded by our community members, to be sold as NFTs.

Tor access

We also offer a way to access union.sh via the Tor network with our own .onion URL address. There are a few things you will need to be aware of. Certain redirects will push you to https. You will have to manually replace the URL with http to continue. See this blog post from the Tor Project about why https certificates do not add value. A Tor developer has more recently spelled out the reasons why serving a Tor service over https is not beneficial for most use cases here.

You can access union.sh on Tor via http://vugppivdvesrx7d5l2ep4fhyofheajmsv3cpzp5j6w5n7we5wm7awoqd.onion

Mastodon FAQ

Frequently asked questions: https://wiki.union.sh/wiki/faq

Staff

This instance is administered by the site owner, @mike. Moderation support is provided by the hard working team of:

@admin@union.sh

@mike@union.sh

@mods@union.sh

If you would like to directly contact our moderation team, we have an account at @mods, and can be reached via email at mods@union.sh

Funding

Since we do not serve ads and we do not sell data we rely on your support. If you like you can donate to help us out a little.

You can help out the community by donating in several ways:

  • Become a Patron
  • Support via Stripe
  • Support on LiberaPay
  • Buy us a Ko-Fi
  • OpenCollective Backers
  • Venmo: @unionsh

Servers

We are hosted on Digital Ocean's infrastructure. US based data center in New York City. Advanced data storage. Daily backups. We commit to abide by the Mastodon Server Covenant.

Legal

DMCA (Digital Millennium Copyright Act) Notice

As required by the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 (17 U.S.C. 512 (c)), all notifications of copyright infringement regarding content hosted on union.sh should be sent ONLY to its designated agent. Perfect Ping, LLC 8 The Green, STE 4000 Dover, DE 19901 dmca@union.sh

Attributions

This instance uses Mutant Standard emoji made by Dzuk, which are licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International License.

Robomoji, a modified subset of the Mutant Standard emoji, which are also provided under the Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International License.

Blobhaj emoji, by heatherhorns, licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License.

Blocked Instances

We maintain a blocklist of instances that we do not federate with. If you believe that an instance should be added to this list, please contact an admin or moderator.

For privacy and safety of our community, we do not comment on most instance blocks that we have in place. We have recently begun sharing details on major/oft commented moderation decisions via @mods@union.sh

The list is visible for logged-in members under the section Moderated servers below. While we understand that not publishing this list for non-members is not fully transparent, we are not trying to scare of potential new members who want to ensure that their friends are not blocked. The only nefarious intent here are those who have used this information when public to harass individuals and the instance as a whole. Bluntly, if those are the people that you want to interact with, you should probably join their instance instead.

What is the Top Tech Tidbits Newsletter?

The Top Tech Tidbits Newsletter (https://toptechtidbits.com/subscribe) is the world's leading not-for-profit adaptive technology publication that reaches over 10,000 blind, low vision, deaf, hard of hearing, deafblind, neurodivergent and/or disabled professionals, educators and enthusiasts, all over the world, each week.

What is Adaptive Technology?

Adaptive Technology refers to items that are specifically designed for people with disabilities. Adaptive Technology is a subset of Assistive Technology. Adaptive Technology often refers specifically to electronic and information technology access.

Where Can I Learn More About Top Tech Tidbits?

Learn more about Top Tech Tidbits atÂ https://toptechtidbits.com, where you can also review all of our back issues, from 2008 to present, completely free of charge.

How Can I Subscribe To Receive The Top Tech Tidbits Newsletter?

Subscribe to receive Top Tech Tidbits today at: https://toptechtidbits.com/subscribe. Once you're subscribed you will begin receiving each new issue by email every Thursday morning at 4:00 AM ET.

Is There A Cost To Receive The Top Tech Tidbits Newsletter?

No there is not. And there never will be. While we do offer benefits to Premium Subscribers (https://toptechtidbits.com/premium) Top Tech Tidbits does not charge a subscription fee to readers, and we never will.

Where Can I Review The Most Recent Issues of Top Tech Tidbits?

You can always review the most recent issues of Top Tech Tidbits online at any time by visiting: https://toptechtidbits.com/#new or by RSS at https://toptechtidbits.com/rss.

Top Tech Tidbits is a Mind Vault Solutions, Ltd. (https://mvsltd.com) Publication.

Top Tech Tidbits is a Sponsor (https://toptechtidbits.com/sponsor) and Reader https://toptechtidbits.com/donate supported publication.
Short: The official Mastodon server of the Top Tech Tidbits publication. The world's #1 online resource for current news and trends in adaptive technology.

Herzlich willkommen beim Darknight-Coffee.Cannabis-Club! Wir sind begeisterte Cannabis-Enthusiasten, die sich fÃ¼r die Legalisierung von Cannabis einsetzen und sichere und verantwortungsvolle Nutzung fÃ¶rdern. Unser Ziel ist es, eine offene und transparente Community zu schaffen, in der Wissen und Informationen Ã¼ber Cannabis ausgetauscht werden kÃ¶nnen. Dank der Fortschritte in der Cannabis-Entkriminalisierung gibt es endlich eine bedeutende VerÃ¤nderung, die darauf abzielt, die LebensqualitÃ¤t von vielen Menschen zu verbessern und die Strafverfolgungsressourcen effizienter zu nutzen. Die Strafverfolgung von einfachen Konsumenten wird endlich eingestellt. DarÃ¼ber hinaus plant die Regierung, Anbauklubs einzufÃ¼hren, um einen legalen Zugang zu Cannabis zu ermÃ¶glichen. Dies ist ein weiterer Schritt in Richtung einer umfassenderen Regulierung des Cannabismarktes. Als Mitglied unseres Clubs kannst du Teil dieser Bewegung werden und uns bei unserem Bestreben unterstÃ¼tzen, die Entkriminalisierung von Cannabis voranzutreiben. FÃ¼lle einfach das Anmeldeformular aus und schicke es uns zu. Wir werden uns so schnell wie mÃ¶glich bei dir melden. Als Clubmitglied hast du auÃŸerdem Zugang zu unseren regelmÃ¤ÃŸigen Blog-BeitrÃ¤gen zu den Themen Cannabis, Legalisierung und Verantwortung. Bleib auf dem neuesten Stand und informiere dich Ã¼ber die aktuellen Entwicklungen. Wir setzen uns nicht nur fÃ¼r die Legalisierung von Cannabis ein, sondern auch fÃ¼r den Jugendschutz und Verbraucherschutz. Cannabis kann fÃ¼r Kinder und Jugendliche schÃ¤dlich sein, wenn sie zu frÃ¼h oder zu stark konsumieren. Durch die Legalisierung wird sichergestellt, dass Cannabis kontrolliert und sauber abgegeben wird und somit unnÃ¶tige Risiken fÃ¼r Kinder, Jugendliche und Verbraucher vermieden werden. Werden auch du Teil unserer Community und setze dich fÃ¼r eine sichere und verantwortungsvolle Nutzung von Cannabis ein! Schaut gerne auch in den Bereichen vorbei!!

Besuche unsere anderen Seiten und Foren: Cannabis Forum, Mastodon, Netzspielplatz Blog, Darknight-Coffee-Netztreff, Darknight-Coffee-Tube, Liberapay, Darknight-Coffee-Netztreff, Darknight-Coffee-Podcast, Darknight-Coffee-Treff, pixelbilder.darknight-coffee.de, Darknight-Coffeetreff.

Description:
This is an ephemeral, testing, sandbox Mastodon server, used for things like API tests, and is run by @foo@fosstodon.org (Ryan Finnie). No really, this is nothing but a sandbox server, and could go away at any moment. Put it this way, it's installed on a free Ampere instance on Oracle Cloud, and I didn't bother to check if Oracle Cloud instances are ephemeral by default or not.

If you are interested in creating account(s) for testing purposes:

  • Read the above information.
  • Read the server rules.
  • Include with the request an actual description of what you want to do with the accounts.
  • Include with the request the magic phrase "hello rock stars".
Short: A testing sandbox server. If you would like to use it, see About. No really, it's not optional.

Welcome!

NorthStar Social is a digital community for Minnesotans. If you're a Minnesotan by geography or in your heart, welcome! ğŸŒŸ

Our community uses Mastodon, a new social networking tool that offers a unique microblogging experience, allowing users to share short, timely updates called "toots." It's perfect for expressing your thoughts, sharing your passions, and connecting with others in an authentic and meaningful way.

If you're moving on from Twitter or just looking to try something new, NorthStar Social is the perfect place for you. As part of our community, you'll enjoy: ğŸ  A welcoming space tailored for Minnesotans and those who love the North Star State. ğŸ¨ Creative Freedom with support for a wide range of multimedia options, including text, images, videos, and GIFs. ğŸŒ A diverse network of users who share your interests and values.

Join Us

Ready to shine bright in the NorthStar Social sky? Follow these steps to get started: âœ¨ Sign up: Create your account and begin your journey in the NorthStar Social universe. âœ¨ Customize your profile: Add a profile picture, bio, and header image that reflects your unique personality and Minnesota pride. âœ¨ Connect with others: Discover and follow fellow Minnesotans, engage in conversations, and explore the vast array of topics our community has to offer. âœ¨ Share your light: Express yourself through toots, whether you're discussing local news, sharing your latest adventures, or sending a friendly "hello" to your neighbors.

  • Join our constellation of Minnesotans today and let your true self shine. Welcome to NorthStar Social! ğŸŒŒ

Description:
Your Daily Dose of Decentralization

Our site, dt.gl is a digital media platform the covers all things tech. We had a blog for over 10 years and moved now to microblogging on our own mastodon instance.

We publish news, analyses, op-eds and articles across a broad spectrum of topics, primarily in the areas of privacy, decentralization, cryptocurrency and the blockchain but also touching on the Internet of Things and other next-generation technologies.

Whilst eliciting content from our readership, we have a small but dedicated team of in-house writers and also publish regular updates from various news feeds and media agencies.

We believe in the basic human right of being able to live the life we choose to lead; to be free from intrusion, control and interference by the â€˜stateâ€™ and major corporations; and to the integrity of our personal data and dignity.

We believe we owe it to future generations to hand on a safe and clean world to them and we invite you to join us.

The future wonâ€™t be decentralized so join the conversation!
Short: We operate privacy.do and decentralize.today. No Ads, no trackers! #privacymatters

Description:
What We Do

Moderator Community

Volunteer moderators are the backbone of the open social web, performing a vital service with little to no support. Our community offers best practices, documentation, wellness tools, shared stories, and more.

Trust & Safety Support

The social web can benefit from tried and trusted services used worldwide, but these resources cost money. IFTAS offers help with legal and compliance issues, cybersecurity, and useful apps and APIs to provide solutions for common problems.

Moderation-as-a-Service

IFTAS plans to offer detection and reporting services, as well as denylist management, spam account support, security and privacy tools and â€“ if needed â€“ hands-on content moderation.

  • Learn more at https://about.iftas.org
  • Support our work at https://givebutter.com/iftas
  • Subscribe to our newsletter at https://subscribepage.io/iftas
Short: IFTAS is a non-profit organisation created to support the Fediverse moderator community

Description:
Ropeburn social guidelines

Welcome!

This is a mastodon instance that centres trans and queer experiences. We've set up this server to provide a safer space for the Swedish kink community, but anyone who respects the server are welcome.

You're very welcome to join us here, but if you do, know that we ask everyone to keep a few things in mind. The following list is not exhaustive, and will be modified and expanded over time. Look, if you get it and you're good with it, great. If you don't get it, figure it out - we can help! If you don't want to get it, maybe find somewhere else to hang your hat.

Be you

This is a space for us to be us. Take up that space, we'll love you for it.

Be here

This is a social, anti-capitalist space. No brands, no marketing, no data-miners. You're in this space for its social function, not to monetize it. Don't use this space as a marketing platform.

Share with us

Tell us what you are up to! Talk to other people about what they are up to! Make things! Post your art! Share your knowledge! Ask the questions that keep you awake at night.

Respect this space, and keep it safe

Harassment will not be tolerated, oppressive behaviour will not be tolerated, and while failure to recognize the boundaries of others may be met at first with a gentle attempt to educate you, repeated failure will not be tolerated.

Banal Bullshit Unwelcome

There's nothing interesting about transphobia, homophobia, sexism, racism or any of the other unexamined default settings some people grow up with. Being a nazi isn't an opinion, it's shitty and aggressively boring - take it somewhere else. You can feel free to disagree somewhere else where none of us have to hear you. Enforced strictly.

Kink rules are kinky

18+ only

Everyone on this server needs to be 18+. While we would love to provide a safe space for underage kinksters, we don't have the skill to do that. Yet.

Consent

Keep your hot stuff consensual. No exceptions.

Mind the federation

This is a regularly federated instance. That means that your public content will be seen my people who are not in our interest group. A CW, and marking media as sensitive content, are necessary not to get blocked by other servers. (You may set your own policies for your followers-only posts and your local-only posts.)

Be thoughtful of the people who might be reading / seeing your content on their federated timelines.

Post your own nudes

If you're posting a picture that's not yours, attribute it correctly.

Standing on the Shoulders of Giants

We are very thankful to other community like weirder.earth and rage.love and the people running them. The hard-gained knowledge they have about unsafe communities is invaluable, as is their extensive rules and policies that are informed by this.

We are also immensely grateful to the people who have run spaces like playvicous, and who have informed us on the anti-blackness that exists in the fediverse, and how it shows up in this space.

We also like to mention the people who started the fediblock hashtag, a cornerstone of our moderation.

Moderation

The current moderation is done by 1 (one) person with varying amount of spoons. Allow 48 hours for answers, actions and replies.

To report a toot, click the "3" dots menu and click report. It will allow you to select one or more toot. You'll also be able to add a note for the moderators to see. Sadly, we're stuck with a report interface that does nothing if you report something as "spam" or "I don't like it", you have to choose "it's something else" for a proper report to be sent. The other two alternatives won't be visible to your mods.

We are looking for help to moderate this community, we would appreciate people from different background, life experience and geographies. We are currently pale and fairly euro-centric.

To do so and improve bias, we will favourite people that are not cis men, hetero, white, able. To apply, send a DM to @service@ropeburn.social, the process is not formalized and might take a while.

Ropeburn Dot Social will suspend any instance launched, acquired or funded by Alphabet, Facebook, Twitter, Microsoft, Apple, Amazon, Elsevier or similar corporation.

Funding

This server is collectively funded, and you're welcome to participate over at liberapay.org:
Short: A queer-centric, kink-friendly social server. This is an anti-racist space.

Description:
Non Sequiturs is a community focused on tech, pedantry, and humor.

Most of the discussions here revolve around technology, hobbies, and silliness. Some of the later may include U.S. political satire. There is also a focus on science and reason, including atheism. Generally speaking, the community promotes civil rights and equality for all regardless of gender identity, sexual preference, political party, etc. But we also believe in frank discussions so leave your offense at the door. If we don't have tough conversations we can't truly understand and appreciate each other.

The community is managed by Michael Argentini, a software developer and Managing Partner for Fynydd and Blue Sequoyah Technologies, the project lead for Coursabi, and Ä€thepedia founder. He also has several nerdy open source projects on Github.
Short: Non Sequiturs is the personal Mastodon instance of Michael Argentini.

Description:
About

This instance is dedicated to wholesome photographer content.

Rules

  1. No illegal content under European law, this includes:
    1. Terrorist content.
    2. Depictions of child/cub/loli pornography.
    3. Restrictions on court reporting such as:
      1. Evidence.
      2. Names.
      3. Photos.
    4. Classified materials: Materials that have an official designation other than unclassified.
  2. Speech:
    1. Disagreement is inevitable from time to time, but respect for the views of others will go a long way to winning respect for your own view. Respecting other people, their work, their contributions and assuming well-meaning motivation will make others feel comfortable and safe.
    2. No illegal speech under European law, this includes:
      1. Incitement to breaking the law.
      2. Holocaust denial and distortion.
      3. Legal advice without a license: Legal support is fine.
      4. Calls to violence: Any individual promoting violence towards any person or group.
      5. Privileged communications: Medical information kept between a doctor and patient etc.
      6. Giving medical advice/diagnosis without a license: It's suggested you only link to authoritive medical sources.
      7. No hate speech, defined as any kind of communication in speech, writing or behaviour, that attacks or uses pejorative or discriminatory language with reference to a protected characteristic, in other words, based on their:
        1. Age.
        2. Disability.
        3. Ethnicity.
        4. Gender.
        5. Pregnancy.
        6. Religion.
        7. Nationality.
        8. Sex.
        9. Sexuality.
  3. Do not abuse others, this includes:
    1. Doxing.
    2. Explicit calls to dogpile.
    3. Intentionally circumventing peoples blocks.
    4. A user explicitly asks you to disengage and you do not.
  4. Do not use this service for bad faith purposes, this includes:
    1. Mass unsoliciated messages.
    2. Search engine manipulation.
    3. Spreading malware.
    4. Phishing.
  5. Do not circumvent moderation of this instance, this includes:
    1. Bypassing intentional restrictions imposed by moderation.
    2. Ban evasion.

Moderation

We disclose our server moderation actions, on which servers, when they were taken (UTC timezone) and why on our "Moderated servers" section.
Short: Embracing the moments of beauty in life while spreading smiles through the lens!

Description: Akkoma: The cooler fediverse server

Hello! This is a small server for anyone with literary interests. Whatever you read, write, pile up next to your bed, or circle in review magazines, we're interested.

Heffalump.club aims to be a small, friendly community of people who have chosen this particular Very Deep Pit to be in. We run a tweaked version of Mastodon called Hometown, which adds the option to share posts only with your fellow heffalump.club members. We aim to be a democratically-run server, just as soon as we have any members.
Short: A server for anyone with literary interests, whether as reader, writer, or both.

Description:
Mondoweiss is an independent website devoted to informing readers about developments in Israel/Palestine and related US foreign policy. We provide news and analysis unavailable through the mainstream media regarding the struggle for Palestinian human rights.

Founded in 2006 as a personal blog of journalist Philip Weiss, Mondoweiss grew inside the progressive Jewish community and has become a critical resource for the movement for justice for Palestinians. We continue to follow debates over the role of Israel and nationalism in Jewish American life while seeking to reflect a diverse community of views on issues of international importance. We recognize that Jewish voices are often prioritized in discussions of Israel and seek to challenge that dynamic by bringing a universalist focus to an issue that is commonly dominated by narrow points of view.

We publish original on-the-ground reporting, analysis by scholars and personal stories. As the site has grown, we have developed a large group of regular contributors who are committed to high journalistic standards of documentable evidence and reliable sourcing.

Mondoweiss editors select content for the site on the basis of our shared commitment to news professionalism as well as justice for Palestinians. We do not have a single editorial position on specific issues, but aim to build a diverse online community, with special focus on viewpoints generally ignored by large media outlets. Writing published on Mondoweiss represents the views of its authors and does not necessarily represent the opinions of the site or its editors.

Mondoweiss maintains complete editorial independence from donors and financial supporters, who have no influence on the direction or content of our reporting.
Short: News & Analysis for People Taking Action for Palestine.

Description:
Impressum:

Impressum

KAELIN MarketingServices®

Huebwiesenstrasse 22

CH-8954 Geroldswil

E-Mail: info@chkms.ch

Telefon: +41(0)43 536 20 91 KEIN SUPPORT!

Verhaltensregeln

Wir haben für die Nutzung gewisse Serverregeln erstellt, die Ihr etwas weiter unten auf dieser Seite findet und die Ihr mit der Erstellung eines Kontos bei photosharing.work akzeptiert. Bitte beachtet, andere Instanzen haben andere Regeln. Was hier erlaubt ist, kann dort verboten sein und umgekehrt. Wenn Ihr Verstöße erkennt, könnt Ihr diese über das Meldesystem melden. Bitte seid dort so genau wie möglich und gebt uns ggf. Zusatzinformationen, damit wir den Vorfall besser (und schneller) einordnen können. Damit helft Ihr uns. Bei Verstößen gegen die Serverregeln kann es zu einer Löschung der Beiträge und auch zur Löschung des verursachenden Kontos kommen. Bitte beachtet, dass es keine Rückmeldung gibt, was mit Eurer Meldung geschieht.

Relaying

Es besteht ein aktives Relay mit der Instanz kanoa.de

Was bedeutet Relaying?

Alle Nachrichten (Toots), die öffentlich markiert sind und auf der lokalen Zeitleiste erscheinen, werden zusätzlich auf den o.g. Relay übergeben und somit zusätzlich in den lokalen Zeitleiste auf den teilnehmenden anderen Instanzen eingeblendet. Dies fördert kleinere Instanzen um mehr Inhalte in der lokalen Zeitleiste angezeigt zu bekommen. Ihr müsst hierzu selbst nichts machen, dies geschieht automatisch.

Server

Der Standort aller benötigten Server für photosharing.work ist in Deutschland.

Serverstatus

Über HetrixTools könnt Ihr einsehen, ob die Server derzeit erreichbar sind.
Short: Hallo auf photosharing.work. Dies ist eine deutschsprachige Mastodon-Instanz fÃ¼r Fotografen und Fotobegeisterte zum trÃ¶ten, neue Leute kennenlernen, sich auszutauschen und Spass zu haben.

Description:
Welcome to Saiyajin Space

In this instance, all users have superpowers. I, SonGoku, want everyone here to be Saiyajins. Strong and powerful to fight back against all those who have harmed or wronged you in the past. This instance is meant to be a safe space for anyone who needs a plush shelter to retreat to or draw strength from.

Every time you step outside the door, write a toot or talk to other people out there you have superpowers. Nothing and no one can stop you in your plans, dreams, ideas and desires.

This instance is not a DragonBall instance for Zlarpers, thus we like DragonBall like all other Animes. It is an instance that deals with many nerd topics: IT and Tech, DIY, Nerdstuff, Cosplay, Roleplay, Gaming or just chilling in the corner.

We have strict rules, but they serve to protect this instance, because I want everyone to feel at home here without being disturbed.

~SonGoku

Flavor of Mastodon

This is a glitch-soc based mastodon instance. We have raised the limits:

  • Max Toot Chars: 1500
  • Max Pinned Toots: 10
  • Max Bio Chars: 1500
  • Max Profile Fields: 10
  • Max Poll Fields: 10

Imprint

This is a non commercial driven instance.

Holger Schramm
Bracken Road No 51
D18CV48 Dublin
Ireland

Description:
Rules

Attachments

  • You can upload content that's not yours, just credit the author.
  • Mark NSFW content :eye:
  • Do not use pictures showing genitalia, breasts or bottoms as avatars.
  • Do not upload anything illegal.
    • Sexually suggestive depictions of minors or nude photos of them are not allowed.
    • You have to be at least 18 years old to post sexually suggestive or nude pictures of yourself.
    • Art is free expression. All art is allowed.
    • Realistic 3D models meant to mimic/modeled after children are NOT allowed.
    • Drawings modeled after real children are NOT allowed.

Conduct rules

  • You must be 18+ to join
  • Boosting content is the same as posting content, if you boost something, it must follow these rules
  • Don't upload or link to anything illegal / you don't have rights to it
  • No Spam
    • Automated or manual posting of the same toot/toots in a short amount of time
  • No Doxxing
    • Revealing personal information of an individual not available on the surface web
  • Don't impersonate people
    • If you're running a parody account of someone, state so in the bio
  • No Credible Direct Threats
    • "Kill group/person x.", "Destroy place y.",...
  • Do not discuss or implicate past, present or potentially future illegal activities.
  • Do not condone or endorse child abuse/molestation.
  • Report people breaking rules
  • Don't abuse the report tool

Description:
This is a small private server for a group of friends & family. The cutest domain name we've had at our disposal.

This is a small safe space for friends & family, and as such the moderation rules are "no assholes, no harassment, no discrimination, no hate speech, no nazis, no illegal content". Overreaching assholes from outside will be blocked.

While any further rules are hammered out, a guiding code of conduct is the Berlin Code of Conduct.

Administrative

Reach out to @m or @anna in moderation/administration matters.

  • Software managed by masto.host
  • AUTHORIZED_FETCH is enabled

Emoji credits:

  • Blourgh the Two-faced Frog by @anna
  • Pride flag hearts by @katwylder@mastodon.art
  • Hammy emotes by @fluffyfied@artisan.chat
  • Heart baloons, console controllers, Ferris & Mutant Standard emoji by @dzuk@weirder.earth (also http://dzuk.zone/ and https://mutant.tech/ )
  • Blobfox emoji by @volpeon@is-a.wyvern.rip (also https://volpeon.ink/ )
  • Blobhaj emoji by @heatherhorns@plush.city (http://heatherhorns.com/emoji/)
  • Angry Pingu emoji by Raisupon (https://ko-fi.com/raisupon/)
Short: A small private server for a group of friends & families. No discrimination/harassment/bad behavior accepted. The cutest domain name we've currently had.

Description:
hello there!

welcome to Furstownâ€”yet another furry fandomâ€“focused Mastodon instance!

this is a (mostly) general topic furry instance, so feel free to do whatever you want (within the boundary of the server rules)!

mayor tantan is in the office to serve the townspeople, so feel free to contact him in case you need any assistance!

read the rules (plz)

please take time to read and understand our rules listed below! believe it or not, they're here mostly to protecc you rather than to constrain you.

other (maybe) legal stuff

operating entity

Furstown is operated by an individual, solely for non-profit purposes.

server location

Furstown server is located in New York, NY, USA, and is subject to the laws of the United States.

dmca takedown

you may submit takedown request targeting the content that satisfies the following criteria: a) you are the rightful owner of the content you want to take down with credible proof backing such ownership, and b) the content originated from Furstown. please send a formal request to mayor@furs.town with all the necessary details and we will respond as soon as possible.

gdpr compliance

we are compliant to gdpr in the sense that you have full control over your own data. we store only the data you voluntarily and knowingly provide. we do not track you. we do not sell your data. we do not arbitrarily share your data to any third-party except federated instances.

recognition

Furstown uses the following creations:

  • Mastodon (by Mastodon contributors) under AGPL-3.0-or-later
  • Blobfox (by volpeon) under Apache-2.0
  • server thumbnail "welcome to Furstown" (by Sinna)
  • other various emojis we borrowed from remote instances (by the people)
Short: Furstownâ€”yet another furry fandomâ€“focused Mastodon instance!

Description: Akkoma: The cooler fediverse server

Thanks for your interest in my server! This is Sharon's personal Mastodon instance. Sorry, no one else can sign up for an account here. I deliberately used the masto.machlis.com subdomain for this instance so I wouldn't be tempted to expand it later (who else besides family would want that URL?). Things like moderation, setting up rules, and worrying about downtime and scaling up for multiple users are all beyond the scope of this project! It's hosted at masto.host. Highly recommend.

Description: Akkoma: The cooler fediverse server

This is a small friends & family instance.

Rules and policies borrowed from meow.social, furry.engineer and infosec.exchange.

Moderation / Content Policies

Federation Policy

We are an open-first instance, however in cases where an instance had been identified as being, indifferent to, permissive of, or actively encouraging abusive conduct, that instance will be blocked from federation.

User Conduct Policy

In the hopefully unlikely event that a user breaks the rules, the offending content will be removed and the user suspended. For harassment, discrimination, or illegal activity, the user's account will be terminated.

User Generated Content

We ask that all profile content (avatar, header, display name, bio, etc.) are completely safe, without any explicit content.

Illegal content, or content depicting hate symbolism or iconography, will be removed and result in termination of the offending user.

Report System

Description:
The Kingdom Hearts Database is a project working to build the ultimate source for news, information, and media from the Kingdom Hearts series by preserving all official content related to the series.

We accomplish this mission by focusing on being reliable, complete, and welcoming to all members of the Kingdom Hearts community.

This Mastodon instance has been created to give an independent home for the Kingdom Hearts Database. It is currently closed for sign-ups.

The Kingdom Hearts Database was created on March 5, 2018, in anticipation for the release of Kingdom Hearts III.
Short: The fediverse home of the Kingdom Hearts Database, the ultimate resource for Kingdom Hearts news, information, and media from the Kingdom Hearts series!

Description:
Welcome to the Dragon Tavern, where we cater to all beings. This instance was put together by a few friends who actively maintain and moderate the tavern.

The hosting behind this instance:

This mastodon instance is hosted from the servers within Diedrich's homelab, they are the only one who has access to the systems. The web server and database have regular backups.

  • DERGTVRN-MAST - Web Server
  • DERGTVRN-DB - Database
  • DERGTVRN-S3 - S3 storage

The Mastodon instance is run on a Hypervisor within the cluster of Diedrich's homelab. The Spec of the Instance is 12CPU cores allocated and 32GB RAM assigned. The DB is also run on the same Cluster of servers. The S3 compatible storage is hosted by Cloudflare's R2.

This instance uses Mutant Standard emoji, which are licensed under a CC BY-NC-SA 4.0 International License.
Short: The Dragon tavern, a cozy tavern designed to be a LGBTQ+ safe space. Friendly, VRChat, DnD, Gamers, Furries, Scalies.

Description:
Welcome to "Mitch's Playground" - a unique Mastodon server instance created just for Mitch! This is a single-user space, specifically managed and tailored to cater to Mitch's social networking preferences.

"Mitch's Playground" is more than just a server instance. It's Mitchâ€™s personal digital haven where he can engage with the Mastodon network while maintaining his own rules and settings.

We take security seriously here. Even though this playground is meant for one person, we want to ensure that it remains secure and free from unwanted intrusions. That's why reports are fully functional! If there are any signs of hacking attempts or spam intrusions, they can be reported immediately so appropriate actions can be taken.

So step into "Mitchâ€™s Playground", where the world of Mastodon becomes your own personal sandbox. Enjoy the freedom of managing your social media presence on your terms in your very own corner of the internet!
Short: Hello. This is Mitch's private Mastodon server. It is single-user, and running via Docker, managed by Cloudron.

Description:
Anakmanis is a private server that runs on a small server and may never be open for registration.

Anakmanis adalah private server yang di jalankan di sebuah server kecil dan kemungkinan besar tidak akan pernah terbuka untuk pendaftaran.

Maintenance

The maintenance is usually unscheduled, so expect it will be offline for hours or days.

Perbaikan biasanya di lakukan tanpa terjadwal, sehingga bisa saja server bisa mati dalam waktu yang tak bisa di tentukan.

Language

Bahasa Indonesia and English

Bahasa yang di gunakan adalah Bahasa Indonesia dan Inggris.

Anakmanis is a private server that may never open for registration. 
The maintenance is usually unscheduled, so expect it will be offline for hours or days.

Description:
ğŸ© Welcome to my digital circus, where technology takes center stage and laughter is the main act! ğŸ¤¡âœ¨

Step right up and prepare to be amazed by a spectacle like no other. I'm the ringmaster of this whimsical instance, juggling bits and bytes with a sprinkle of magic. ğŸªğŸŒŸ

Join our merry band of digital misfits as we navigate the virtual tightrope of technology. From coding capers to server acrobatics, we're here to entertain and amuse. ğŸ¤¹â€â™€ï¸ğŸ’»

Prepare to witness breathtaking feats of troubleshooting, where bugs are tamed and crashes are turned into standing ovations. ğŸ›ğŸ‘

In this enchanting digital circus, innovation is our lion's roar, and creativity knows no bounds. We believe in pushing boundaries, thinking outside the box, and occasionally making the servers laugh with our witty command lines. ğŸ˜„ğŸ˜

So grab a front-row seat, buckle up for a wild ride, and get ready to LOL (Laugh Out of Lines). Here, we embrace the power of laughter, knowing that a giggle can fix any error and a smile can light up even the darkest of server rooms. ğŸ˜‚ğŸ’¡

Whether you're a tech aficionado or simply someone who enjoys a good laugh, this is the place where technology meets comedy in a grand symphony of digital entertainment. ğŸ­ğŸ‰

So, leave your serious face at the door, bring your funny bone, and let's embark on a hilarious journey through the whimsical wonders of our digital circus! Get ready for a rollercoaster of laughter and a parade of memorable moments. ğŸ¢ğŸ¤£

Welcome to the zaniest show on the web, where bytes become chuckles and codes dance to the rhythm of laughter! Enjoy the ride and remember: in this circus, bugs are just clowns in disguise! ğŸ‰ğŸğŸ˜„
Short: Welcome to my little corner of the internet, where technology and laughter go hand in hand. Let's make the digital realm a more enjoyable place, one toot at a time!

Description:
Discover the realm of innovation at Droolware.social, a Mastodon instance crafted exclusively for techies and enthusiasts. Immerse yourself in a community focused on all things tech, where you can share cutting-edge projects, collaborate on technical endeavors, and engage in insightful discussions. From programming and software development to hardware hacking and cybersecurity, Droolware.social provides a platform for like-minded individuals to exchange ideas, seek advice, and expand their technical horizons. Whether you're a seasoned professional, a curious hobbyist, or an aspiring techie, join us to connect with fellow tech enthusiasts and embrace the excitement of the digital frontier.

Welcome to the world of Droolware.social - where innovation meets community.
Short: Droolware.social: Unleash your techie side. Join a vibrant Mastodon community for tech enthusiasts. Collaborate, share projects, and dive into insightful discussions on all things tech.
