Description:
The ShutinNerd, Mastodon Edition

This is a Mastodon instance managed and owned by Dolitehgreat, the ShutinNerd. It's just me right now, but maybe if my friends and family decide to join in I'll add them in.

What to expect

Mostly me tootin' (publishing if you're a coward) things about Linux, Homelabing, Sports, Gundam, Transformers (Beast Wars specifically), and my four dogs.

What's the deal with "ShutinNerd"?

Look when you live down South and have real bad seasonal allergies, you find things to do inside.

Buddy that's a lot of Beast Wars chatter.

We stan our Beasties in this instance, and I hope you're ready for that.

Are you any good at that whole Linux stuff? Can I ask you questions?

Uhhh, I guess you can, but don't do the suggestions in prod ok? If you do, you didn't get the commands from me.

Rules? But it's just you?

Very true, so think of them more as a code, and what you won't be seeing from me. I'm open to all minus the grifters, the fascists, the haters of any rainbow flags.
Short: This is the Mastodon for one Dolitehgreat, The ShutinNerd.

Description:
This is a single user instance for @sungo. [ eme-gilim-ma is sumerian for confused speech ('tongue' + 'to be twisted, tangled' + nominative). ]

Blocked on sight:

  • Free speech zones
  • Conservatives, Republicans, Trump-ists, Holocaust or 9/11 or 1/6 deniers, nazis, white nationalists, anti-vaxxers
  • Loli
  • Folks generally trying to ruin the fediverse experience for others
  • Folks who piss me off
  • If I even suspect it's slightly illegal in my jurisdiction

If I am accidentally federating with any instances pushing this crap, please let me know and I'll block them

(Please note that your inclusion in the above list is based on my subjective opinion and there is no appeal process. Not sure why you'd care about losing access to a single person instance but whatever.)
Short: A single user instance for @sungo. eme-gilim-ma is sumerian for confused speech ('tongue' + 'to be twisted, tangled' + nominative).

Description:
This place is a message... and part of a system of messages... pay attention to it!
Sending this message was important to us. We considered ourselves to be a powerful culture.
This place is not a place of honor... no highly esteemed deed is commemorated here... nothing valued is here.
What is here was dangerous and repulsive to us. This message is a warning about danger.
The danger is in a particular location... it increases towards a center... the center of danger is here... of a particular size and shape, and below us.
The danger is still present, in your time, as it was in ours.
The danger is to the body, and it can kill.
The form of the danger is an emanation of energy.
The danger is unleashed only if you substantially disturb this place physically. This place is best shunned and left uninhabited.
Short: This is a private instance for IRL friends.

Description:
Howdy! Welcome! Come on in and make yourself at home!

This is a place for those in libraries and library adjacent professions, like archives, to experiment with Mastodon and the wider the Fediverse. I will do my best to provide you a safe space to do this in. If you're in libraries or are library adjacent, and would like to join this instance, please send an email to admin@libranigans.com from your work email. I'll send you a link that will let you register. For the registration, you can use whatever email you'd like. You don't even have to use your real name. Have fun with it!

It's just a one man show, but if you'd like to try your hand at moderation or the sysop side, give me a message once you get on Libranigans.

Libranigains.com has been a lot of things over the years, from podcast to wikis, but none of them ever really took off. Maybe this instance will just be me and a few friends, or maybe this will become something bigger? Who knows?

Our current mascot is a Highland Cow.

Server Updates: https://about.libranigans.com/ Help: https://about.libranigans.com/how-do-i/ Acceptable Use Policy: https://about.libranigans.com/acceptable-use-policy/ Privacy Policy: https://about.libranigans.com/privacy-policy-2/
Short: This is a place for those in libraries and library adjacent professions, like archives, to experiment with Mastodon and the wider the Fediverse.

Description:
Hello there!

Scruffy.Parts is an invite-only server targeted at "scruffy" men like bears/cubs/wolves/otters/etc and those who love them. We are a small server and will remain that way. We prefer "active" users. This does not necessarily mean tooting your own text/pics -- frequent boosters/favoriters are also welcome.

In general, this instance prefers original content (either personal, or boosting/favoriting of other's personal content). We are not attempting to recreate tumblr.

If you are interested in joining or migrating to our server, please note that registrations are currently closed. Should they reopen, this message will change.

Safe Space

This is a safe space for LGBTQIA2S+ individuals and allies. Please see the server rules and know that individuals and domains who violate the rules will be blocked and/or suspended.

NSFW Content

Avatars and header images may not contain sexually explicit or violent imagery.

Sexually explicit material in toots must have a content warning applied to mark it as sensitive so that the local timeline stays safe for those who prefer NSFW content hidden.

Direct Messaging

Be aware that direct messages to users in Mastodon are not end-to-end encrypted. If you need private communication with a person, please use an app like Signal.

Service Status

In the event of any server issues, updates will be provided here: Status Page
Short: An invite-only server targeted at bears/cubs/wolves/otters/etc and those who love them

Description:
Home of the anti-bully collective known by plsnobully.me

Reporting and moderation

When reporting accounts, please make sure to include at least a few posts that show rule-breaking behaviour, when applicable. If there is any additional context that might help make a decision, please also include it in the comment. This is especially important when the content is in a language nobody on the moderation team speaks.

We usually handle reports within 24 hours. Please mind that you are not notified when a report you have made has led to a punitive action, and that not all punitive actions are externally visible. For first time offences, we may opt to delete offending content, escalating to harsher measures on repeat offences.
Short: the anti-bully collective

Description:
Mission

This instance aims to establish a community of game developers who want to create more sustainable video games. By providing a centralized location for debates on sustainability in game development, we hope to encourage climate activism and more environmentally conscious practices in the industry.

Why sustainability in game development even matters?

Video games are becoming more complex and resource-intensive with each passing year. As game developers work to create larger and more immersive game worlds, the environmental impact of their work increases. Energy consumption, carbon emissions, and electronic waste are just a few of many factors that must be considered when creating video games. By incorporating sustainable practices into game development, we can reduce the environmental impact of the industry while still creating engaging and innovative games.
Short: Welcome to 'Green Game Development' - a Mastodon instance dedicated to sustainable game development. Talk about green games, share knowledge and create a sustainable gaming future together!

Description:
Welcome! This is a personal Mastodon server.

If you're looking to use Mastodon for the first time, you'll need to find a public server which accepts registration [such as the pony-focused Equestria.Social. You can find non-pony ones on the Mastodon website].

If you'd like to follow an account hosted here, simply copy and paste the full username ID [such as @LittleshyFiM@derpy.masto.host] into your client of choice!

You can read more about me as well as find contact info at my website.

I have a simple webpage dedicated to helping bronies learn more about Mastodon and the Fediverse if you'd like to check that out.
Short: Hello! This is a personal Mastodon server. If you're looking to use Mastodon for the first time, you'll need to find a public one which accepts registration. Feel free to look around though!

Description:
Velkommen til Mikrobloggen

Mikrobloggen er en Mastodon-instans i fÃ¸diverset og fÃ¸lger Mastodon Server Convenant.

Dette nettstedet eies av Topdogs Sosietetsforening (registrert i Enhetsregisteret) og alle brukere av Mikrobloggen mÃ¥ vÃ¦re betalende medlemmer i foreningen.

Ã˜nsker du Ã¥ vÃ¦re med pÃ¥ Mikrobloggen?

Du kan nÃ¥ vÃ¦re en av de aller fÃ¸rste. Medlemsskap koster for tiden kroner 200,- per Ã¥r. Dette er for Ã¥ dekke driftskostnadene av instansen.

Hvorfor bli medlem?

Ã˜nsker du Ã¥ vÃ¦re pÃ¥ en norsk instans, tilnÃ¦rmet fri for regler, hvor du ikke risikerer Ã¥ bli stengt ute av en vilkÃ¥rlig moderator og er del av en gjeng som har en felles interesse i Ã¥ ha en aktiv instans fri for reklame, algoritmer og overvÃ¥kning? De som dette hÃ¸res fristende ut kan vÃ¦re med og dele kostnadene ved Ã¥ melde seg inn i foreningen.

Du kan lese mer om hvorfor vi startet Mikrobloggen og den over 20 Ã¥r lange historien til Topdogs Sosietetsforening.

Hvordan bli medlem?

Klikk pÃ¥ "Create Account", fyll ut feltene og skriv i kommentarfeltet at du aksepterer medlemskontigenten og du vil fÃ¥ en epost fra Gaute om hvordan du kan betale. Etter at du har betalt blir kontoen din aktivert.

Eventuelt send en epost til Gaute for andre spÃ¸rsmÃ¥l eller mer informasjon.

Discord

Vi har ogsÃ¥ en Discord server som er Ã¥pen og gratis for alle, uansett om du er medlem av foreningen eller ikke.

DriftsrÃ¥d

Endringer av regler for Mikrobloggen, utnevnelser av roller og eventuelle utestengelser av medlemmer mÃ¥ tas opp i driftsrÃ¥det. DriftsrÃ¥det kan bestÃ¥ av fÃ¸lgende roller:

Driftsleder
@gauteweb og @manny er driftsledere. Manny tar seg av teknisk vedlikehold mens Gaute fÃ¸lger opp vaktmestere og holder driftsrÃ¥d.

Vaktmester
Vaktmesterne er i praksis moderatorer av Mikrobloggen. De skal holde Mikrobloggen ryddig og skikkelig i henhold til reglene som har blitt satt av driftsrÃ¥det (se reglene).

Teknisk informasjon

Denne instansen driftes av masto.host, verdens stÃ¸rste SaaS leverandÃ¸r for Mastodon. Dette sikrer best mulig oppetid og sikkerhet. Serverne stÃ¥r fysisk sett i Frankrike.

FÃ¸lg @manny for driftsmeldinger og annen viktig informasjon til brukere av Mikrobloggen.

Relay tjenester vi bruker

Ã… bruke en eller flere relay tjenester kan vÃ¦re nyttig for mindre instanser for bedre federering, men vil ogsÃ¥ kreve mye ressurser og lagringsplass.

  • relay.babb.be
  • relay.mastodon.nu
  • relay.fedi.buzz (utvalgte emneknagger)

Tilpasninger

Mikrobloggen bruker et tilpasset grensesnitt som skiller seg fra standard Mastodon, og vi har implementert en rekke tilpassede emojies som brukerne kan bruke.

  • TangerineUI
  • Emojies fra Flaticons

Oppetidsstatus

Mikrobloggen bruker UptimeRobot til Ã¥ fÃ¸lge med pÃ¥ oppetiden til selve tjenesten. I tillegg har hosting-leverandÃ¸ren vÃ¥r en statusside for infrastrukturen.

  • UptimeRobot
  • Status masto.host

Description:
Hello, And Welcome! ğŸ‘‹

My name is Marina (AKA Squelf or Squelfland) and this is my very own, personal server, hosting a single account that belong to me. Sign-ups are always closed. I have standards and rules for what I will post, "like" and boost: please see my list of Rules below this section for more information on that.

I use the following tags to make it easy to keep track of my personal projects, art and blog updates, and keep them featured on my profile:

ğŸ¨ #SquelflandArt: All of my art gets posted under this tag.

ğŸ“— #Meganeea: Art, chapter excerpts and announcements relating to my fantasy novel series, Meganeea will be posted under this tag.

ğŸ“˜ #TheTaleOfHorus: Art, chapter excerpts and announcements relating to my fantasy novel, The Tale Of Horus, will be posted under this tag.

ğŸ“• #MasterSequinsAssistants: Art, chapter excerpts and announcements relating to my fairytale novel, Master Sequin's Assistants will be posted under this tag.

ğŸ“™ #FernsPath: Art, chapter excerpts and announcements relating to my dinosaur novel, Fern's Path, will be posted under this tag.

ğŸ““ #BlogUpdates: I cross-post updates from my blog to Mastodon. You can find them under this tag.

ğŸŒˆ NOTES ğŸŒˆ

I keep my moderated servers private to avoid harassment. However, I do suspend and limit instances that have incompatible upload policies to mine, or incompatible rules --and the list is very, very long. I block for the usual reasons... racism, transphobia, CSAM or CSAM-adjacent content, homophobia, extremism, conspiracy theories... etc.

With that said, if you see content that breaks my rules showing up in my federated timeline, please reach out to me via Telegram so I can rectify this.

There are some servers I limit (not suspend) to protect people who are going through this instance's federated tab. Generally it is because I follow a few people from servers that post un-CW'd kink content.

I don't mean to upset anyone by doing this, and I have NOTHING against these servers. ğŸ¥º

If I limited a server, it is only because I want to interact with it but worry about triggering/upsetting other people. Basically, I can curate my experience with filters, but I don't know how else to interact with friends from certain servers while protecting people who federate with me. I hope this makes sense. If I limited your server and you have any questions or concerns you are very welcome to DM me via Telegram.

ğŸŒˆ EMOJO ğŸŒˆ

My server uses the following emojos/emojo packs:

  • ğŸˆ Dracthyr Dragons By aelnru
  • ğŸˆ Square Anime Gifs by Clover Cutie
  • ğŸˆ Dino Nuggie

Description:
This is a general purpose social server catering to what I want to see. It is personally funded by me and I have no interest in charging for it. I really just wanted a place to call my own.

The best way to start a heated argument with others is to discuss religion or politics. You keep your right wing Christian conservative views to yourself, I'll keep my moderate leaning more left than right Pagan views to myself.

Other than that, I'll listen to any complaints folk may have about posts here but I also will not ban anyone for being white, black, brown, yellow or green, gay straight, transgendered, bisexual a-sexual, queer, redneck, Christian, Pagan, Buddhist, Jewish, Muslim, Mormon, or anything else as long as we are all friendly!

This can all be summed up with Harm none. Or if you prefer, treat others as you would like to be treated.

We also accept others pronouns here, no intentionally miss-pronouning anyone.
Short: Just my personal server to filter out some of the toxicity that can come from a large community. All are welcome

Description: In a world of digital connectivity, where distances are bridged by the power of technology, words flow like rivers, carrying thoughts, emotions, and ideas. Through the vast expanse of the virtual realm, connections are forged, transcending physical boundaries and bringing people together. In this dynamic landscape, the essence of being social thrives, as individuals engage, communicate, and interact, building relationships and sharing experiences. The invisible threads woven through the air create a tapestry of human connection, reminding us of the inherent need for social interaction and the beauty that emerges when we come together in the digital sphere.
Short:
Words flow like rivers,
Connections forged through the air,
Being social thrives.
Server being run to be part of the mastodon federation for myself and possibly some friends.

Description:
Welcome to the LANoftheDead Pixelfed Instance.

Primarily its available for members of the LANoftheDead network but we are open to new members to join that will fit in our community.
If you are a open minded person that likes nerds,scifi,linux,plex,tech,gaming,coding, memes, and Dark Humor. Than this is may be a home for you.

We picked the name Kvasir for this instance who was a man in Norse mythology known as a poet and the wisest of all men. He wandered around teaching and instructing, never failing to give the right answer to a question. This aligns with what we would like to accomplish in the fediverse, providing art and knowledge to mankind.

Currently all members are limited to 10GB each as this is a fresh server and we are going to gauge raising that level as we grow, if you need more as we are growing and we have not raised this yet please reach out to admin. 

Please check out our other instances on the FediVerse

    Mastodon - mastodon.lanofthedead.xyz
    Lemmy - odin.lanofthedead.xyz
    Peertube - apollo.lanofthedead.xyz
    Matrix - neo.lanofthedead.xyz
Short:
Welcome to the LANoftheDead Pixelfed Instance.

Description:
Unmukti is a word in Sanskrit that means deliverance.

The company was founded in February 2010 as a Private Limited company limited by shares.

At Unmukti, we specialize in development of Network Appliances and Devices with the best available Free/Libre & Open Source Software (FLOSS) and Liberated Hardware. We strive to bring technology-based solutions to life in a cost-effective manner enabling our clients to conduct their business more effectively.

While alternatives will be available for our products, we promise to be better in terms of service-response and hopefully better in terms of value-for-money.

We are building Network Equipment, Firmware and Networks for more than 10 years now.

With Free/Libre & Open Source Software (FLOSS), we help build networks that are free of restrictive licenses, are feature-rich and truly owned by our clients.

Our firmware is based on OpenWrt and we actively contribute to the OpenWrt project. We have built significant expertise in customising, deploying and managing OpenWrt installations at scale.

The firmware has features like SD-WAN, Wi-Fi Mesh Networking, Auto VPN, Centralized Management, while the Management Services cater for centralized services like Dashboards, Logging, Alerting and Routing.

With our technical expertise we help organisations implement secure, robust and centrally managed networks, and thus, enable them to get the maximum out of their infrastructure through our support and customisation services.

Read more at https://hopbox.net
Short: At Unmukti, we specialize in development of Network Appliances and Devices with the best available Free/Libre & Open Source Software (FLOSS) and Liberated Hardware.

Description:
This is a private instance run by and for myself mainly for private usage.

A separate admin account is present to be contacted if there is an issue.

Although this is a non-public single-user instance I've set up instance rules I shall follow.

This is so that others know what behaviour to expect from this instance including for the possibility if this will become a multi-user instance.

The rules have been adopted and inspired by the chaos.social instance rules.

This instance uses Mutant Standard emoji, which are licensed under a CC BY-NC-SA 4.0 International License.

This instance uses gphn emojis which are licensed as CC BY-NC-SA 4.0

Description:
social.queer.computer is a chill server for queer, nd, plural, alterhuman, and disabled nerds!

Currently, access is invite-only until the initial set of users and moderators are added to the server and things are fully configured. If you wish to invite someone to the server, please contact a moderator or administrator to receive an invite link.

This server is moderated primarily by @techno, with other moderators being added as needed. This process is done by one to three rounds of community votes, depending on the level of current activity in the instance.

Please note that this server is running a build of glitch-soc, and as such, glitches may occasionally occur. If you run into any persistent glitches or errors, please contact @techno through DMs or through email.

Description: Contrefeu: Ardent Ideas

Welcome to talipallopeli.club! This is a queer-positive general purpose server.

The server is an intersectional feminist, sex-positive and leftwing space.

All languages are welcome. We have the translation functionality installed. The maximum post length on the server is 500 characters.

Admin: @emanta Public registrations are always closed. If you want to join us, please DM the admin (approximate response time 12-48 hours) or if you know any of the existing accounts on talipallopeli.club, ask them to invite you.

Our servers are located in Germany and we follow GDPR and other relevant German and European laws.

This instance will not federate with any instances owned or operated by Meta (Facebook, Instagram).
Short: This is a queer-positive general purpose server where intersectional feminism, sex-positivity and leftwing thought flourishes. All languages are welcome.

Description: Akkoma

The social internet should be fun, refreshing, and... well, social.

Our Goal

We aim simply to create a place that fosters friendly social interaction. Some online social platforms like to think of themselves as town squares, but we're going more for a local coffee shop or neighborhood party kind of environment. If that sounds like what you're looking for, we'd love to have you join us and help build our community!

Rules FAQ

For a complete list of all rules, see the dedicated rules section.

This is still a relatively new instance, so all our rules should be considered work-in-progress and very much open to feedback.

Be Considerate Of Others

Part of keeping things here "low-key" involves asking people posting publicly to use Mastodon's content warning feature when discussing topics that may be controversial, inflammatory, or distressing. A good rule of thumb is to put a content warning on anything that may contribute to "doomscrolling".

This will not and cannot be strictly enforced for a variety of reasons. The biggest reason is that the goal of this rule is to keep things fun and stress-free for everyone, not to cause anxiety or to tone police. The important thing we ask is that you please just try to be mindful of others when posting.

You may use content warnings however you would like when posting with any visibility narrower than "public", or when replying to a post.

Don't confront someone who posted something that you believe should have had a content warning on it. Doing that may make the poster feel unwelcome which isn't what we want.

Personal Accounts Only

We love seeing organizations and projects on the Fediverse, but hosting such accounts here doesn't align with our goals as an instance. Kindly look elsewhere if you would like to create an account for your group, project, or organization.

Do Not Post Adult/NSFW Content

Mastodon is federated which means you'll see and be able to follow users from other servers. These servers may have different policies regarding adult content.

We try to limit the reach of remote users and servers that post public, untagged content which violates our policy. This is to make sure it isn't shown to our users who may not want to see it.

For our users, this policy is strictly enforced.
Short: The internet should be fun, refreshing, and social. We are a general purpose server focused on fostering friendly social interactions.

Patashnik is more than a mere handle; it's a whispered enigma, a digital threshold into the unknown. Allegedly born from the cryptic dialect of cosmonauts, it whispers secrets of the cosmos, painted in the hues of a celestial vagabond.

Embodying the essence of a wanderer, a voyager lost to the abyss of space, Patashnik symbolizes the intrepid soul who slipped the tether of Earth's embrace. A fateful narrative unfurlsâ€”a cosmonaut adrift, liberated from the constraints of terrestrial existence, untethered by the severed lifeline, and embraced by the cosmic void.

Yet, amidst this cosmic solitude, Patashnik finds solace in an unconventional euphoria. Imagine, if you will, a solitary figure amidst the stars, content in the absence of human company. Armed with a trove of tranquilityâ€” a copious stash of potent herb and two steadfast companions: bottles of bourbon, shimmering like constellations in the vast expanse.

Here, within this digital realm, Patashnik's cosmic musings offer glimpses into a mind untamed by gravity's constraints. A confluence of cosmic curiosity and existential whimsy, where the vastness of space meets the warmth of a well-stocked escape.

Dare to venture alongside Patashnik, and you may discover the interstellar refuge, where the cosmic jester revels in the cosmic ballet, revels in the freedom of a traveler's spirit, liberated from the tethers of convention and Earthly burdens.

Step beyond the confines of the familiar, and join this celestial pilgrimage. Patashnik beckonsâ€”a cosmic guide, a digital sage, and a testament to the unfathomable reaches of human imagination.

Wir dulden kein diskriminierendes Verhalten und keine Inhalte, die die UnterdrÃ¼ckung von AngehÃ¶rigen von Randgruppen fÃ¶rdern oder befÃ¼rworten. Diese Gruppen kÃ¶nnen durch eine der folgenden Merkmale gekennzeichnet sein (wobei diese Liste natÃ¼rlich unvollstÃ¤ndig ist):

  • Ethnie

  • geschlechtliche IdentitÃ¤t

  • sexuelle IdentitÃ¤t

  • kÃ¶rperliche Merkmale oder Alter

  • Behinderung oder Krankheit

  • NationalitÃ¤t, Wohnsitz, BÃ¼rgerstatus

  • VermÃ¶gen oder Bildung

  • ReligionszugehÃ¶rigkeit, Agnostizismus oder Atheismus

  • Wir dulden kein bedrohliches Verhalten, kein Stalking und kein Doxxing.

  • Wir tolerieren keine BelÃ¤stigung, einschlieÃŸlich Brigading, Dogpiling oder jede andere Form der Kontaktaufnahme mit einem Nutzer, der angegeben hat, dass er nicht kontaktiert werden mÃ¶chte.

  • Wir dulden kein Mobbing, einschlieÃŸlich Beschimpfungen, absichtliche Falschbezeichnung oder Deadnaming.

  • Wir dulden keine gewalttÃ¤tige nationalistische Propaganda, Nazi-Symbolik oder die FÃ¶rderung der Ideologie des Nationalsozialismus.

  • Wir tolerieren keine VerschwÃ¶rungserzÃ¤hlungen oder andere reaktionÃ¤re Mythen, die das oben genannte (und/oder Ã¤hnliche) Verhalten unterstÃ¼tzen oder dazu fÃ¼hren.

(Ãœbersetzt mit www.DeepL.com/Translator (kostenlose Version))

English:

We do not tolerate discriminatory behaviour and content promoting or advocating the oppression of members of marginalised groups. These groups may be characterised by any of the following (though this list is naturally incomplete):

  • ethnicity

  • gender identity or expression

  • sexual identity or expression

  • physical characteristics or age

  • disability or illness

  • nationality, residency, citizen status

  • wealth or education

  • religious affiliation, agnosticism or atheism

  • We do not tolerate threatening behaviour, stalking, and doxxing.

  • We do not tolerate harassment, including brigading, dogpiling, or any other form of contact with a user who has stated that they do not wish to be contacted.

  • We do not tolerate mobbing, including name-calling, intentional misgendering or deadnaming.

  • We do not tolerate violent nationalist propaganda, Nazi symbolism or promoting the ideology of National Socialism.

-We do not tolerate conspiracy narratives or other reactionary myths supporting or leading to the above-mentioned (and/or similar) behavior.

Description:
This is Hamish The PolarBear's Fediverse Instance.


I am anti-corporate and anti-hate. I enforce blocklisting with regard to bad actors in the Fediverse. As a result you may find many larger servers blocked to some extent. In some cases this will mean you cannot have a relationship with anyone on that server. In other cases this will mean only people you follow will show up. If you find this instance not to your liking then the beauty of the Fediverse is that you can migrate whenever you like but I hope you will enjoy it here and stay.


The simple fact is that I am not here to moderate other people's users and I will first and foremost protect my own users when I can. The point of this server is to be a friendly, open and fun space.


ALL reports will be investigated and dealt with as necessary, please do not be afraid to use the reporting tools and never be afraid to call me out if you think I am doing something wrong.
Short: This is Hamish The PolarBear's Fediverse Instance.

Description:
Hihi! I'm Lety, and this is my self-hosted PeerTube server. This entire site is just for my social media videos, so unfortunately you won't be able to make an account...

Er, then how do I follow you?

If you don't already have one, go make an account on any ActivityPub platform. I suggest Mastodon Online or Mastodon Social!

Then search for and follow my Mastodon (@lety@doesstuff.social). That's my main Fedi account, where I post shitty jokes and dumb photos, along with boosting all the videos I post here.

Or you can follow my PeerTube (@letydoesstuff@peertube.doesstuff.social) and PeerTube channel (@letydoesstuff_channel@peertube.doesstuff.social) if you're only interested in my videos.

ActivityPub? Fedi? Mastodon? Heck do those mean???

Now's the part where a dumb person tries to explain some very smart concepts. Okay, so ActivityPub is a protocol, kinda like how email is a protocol. Only instead of sending and receiving messages, the ActivityPub protocol is a way for websites to send and receive social media posts from one another.

Any platform can use the ActivityPub protocol, like how Gmail and iCloud both use the email protocol. We don't send "gmails" or "iclouds"-- we send "emails". Only there's no fancy term for ActivityPub posts, the protocol just went with "posts" and "boosts", like how Twitter had "tweets" and "retweets".

And then Mastodon is a couple of things. Mastodon, the company, makes Mastodon, the software, which anyone can use to run their own version of Mastodon, the platform. They even run two of their own, Mastodon Online and Mastodon Social.

Mastodon's built on the ActivityPub protocol, which means anyone with a Mastodon account can connect to accounts on other ActivityPub platforms such as Misskey, WordPress, and soon, Threads and Tumblr.

Fedi is short for the Fediverse, which is what some people unofficially call the entire community of ActivityPub-based sites that can talk to each other.
Short: The (hopefully) permanent site of Lety's social media! Come listen along as I scream into the void~!

Description:
An erotic social adventure

Erotic Social is an adult content social network for people over 18 years and older. The platform runs on the latest Mastodon(glitch-soc) software and is kept up-to-date.

The server is moderated. We stricktly forbid underaged content and 'lolicon'.

Posting

On this instance you will see all posts as they are posted but from an external instance all posts will have a Content Warning and media is always marked sensitive so you won't have to worry about marking media or posts.

Reporting and moderation

When reporting accounts, please make sure to include at least a few posts that show rule-breaking behaviour, when applicable. If there is any additional context that might help make a decision, please also include it in the comment. This is especially important when the content is in a language nobody on the moderation team speaks.

We usually handle reports within 8 hours. Please mind that you are not notified when a report you have made has led to a punitive action, and that not all punitive actions are externally visible. For first time offenses, we may opt to delete offending content, escalating to harsher measures on repeat offenses.

We have a team of paid moderators. If you would like to become a moderator, get in touch with us through the e-mail: info@erotic.social.

Staff

The current Erotic Social staff members are:

  • @Luna
  • @erotic

Financial support

On this platform we don't run advertisements, we also don't sell your data but instead rely on donations from our community. You can help us stay online by donating via:

  • LiberaPay
  • Patreon

Statistics

You can find some statistics about this instance on the following pages:

  • FediDB
  • Federation Info
  • Fediverse Observer

Description:
Summary

This is the official Mastodon instance for Tracyverse Comics, hosted and managed by @lety. Registrations on this site are exclusive to a select few of our publishing staff and artists, and you won't be able to make an account here.

How to follow us

If you want to follow @tracyscops or any of the other users on our instance, you should first go make an account over at mastodon.social or any one of the many Mastodon instances out there. Wherever you go, you should be able to search for Tracy by looking up @tracyscops@tracyverse.social.

Other users on Tracyverse Social should also be searchable from most other instances. Just search for their usernames under the same pattern @user@tracyverse.social.

What is Mastodon

This is a bit of a complex subject to explain, and you should probably look into this information for yourself if you really want a thorough understanding of the Mastodon software. But just in case that's too much to read...

Tl;dr, Mastodon is a bit like the Social Media Site Formerly Known as Twitter, except Discord-ified.

Much like there are many Discord servers, there are many Mastodon sites called "instances". Users across these instances can all follow and communicate with each other, similarly to how you talk to users on all the different Discord servers, no matter which one you joined first.

Where the analogy falls apart is that, unlike Discord, Mastodon is decentralized, and there is no global "Mastodon account" you can make. You must start somewhere, and mastodon.social is a great place to start, as that's run by the company that maintains the Mastodon software!

All Mastodon instances are connected by something called the ActivityPub protocol, which connects many other decentralized social media platforms.

While some are still working on how to best implement this protocol, in time, you should be able to seamlessly connect to Mastodon from platforms like Threads and Misskey also!
Short: The official Mastodon instance for Tracyverse Comics. Gwelp!

Description:
A server for neurodivergent people.

Formal dx and self-dx are acceptable. In fact, it is not a requirement that you be neurodivergent.

I require that people who want to have an account here subscribe on ko-fi.

I also have an article where I talk about the benefits here.

Why?

First, asking for a subscription is likely to cut down on the people who shouldn't be here.

Second, there are costs involved with maintaining this server. I'd like to cover those costs.

Note that getting a subscription does not guarantee that you can remain on the server if you start misbehaving. THERE WILL NOT BE ANY REFUNDS. I'm not asking for a ton of money. Processing refunds is too much trouble.

What's in it for you?

Well, nobody wants to have bozos around them, so asking for a subscription benefits you too.

I'm a Software Engineer by trade. My server current contains enhancements that are not part of the "official" Mastodon code base. Right now that means longer posts, and a better handling of the column scrolling when you click to load more posts.

Moderation

Please learn to use block and mute, and reserve calls to moderation for cases that are really beyond the pale.

The Picture

That's a picture of poutine, a French-Canadian comfort food. I'm from QuÃ©bec originally.
Short: A server for neurodivergent people.

Description:
A.s.d. Freccette Italia Dart

La A.S.D. F.I.DART (Freccette Italia Dart), Ã¨ una Associazione Sportiva Dilettantistica costituita nellâ€™anno 1994 che gestisce per conto della D.S.A. FIGeST (Federazione Italiana Giochi e Sport Tradizionali) lo sport delle freccette nelle 2 specialitÃ , SOFT DART e STEEL DART, con lâ€™obbiettivo di promuoverne lâ€™attivitÃ  in termini amatoriali ed agonistici.

Lâ€™attivitÃ  della F.I.DART

La F.I.DART organizza per la sezione soft dart i seguenti campionati:

  • Campionato Italiano a squadre.
  • Campionato Italiano Singolo e Doppio.
  • Campionato provinciale a squadre / individuale.
  • Campionato regionale a squadre / individuale.
  • Campionato Doppio Team Regionale.
  • Grand Prix (torneo individuale con classifica nazionale).
  • Coppa Italia Trofeo Fabio Marotto (torneo a squadre con classifica nazionale).

Per quanto riguarda la sezione steel:

  • Campionato italiano a squadre.
  • Campionato Italiano Singolo e Doppio
  • Coppa Italia.

Campionato Italiano a squadre

Ãˆ in assoluto la piÃ¹ importante manifestazione organizzata della F.I.DART, nel corso degli anni Ã¨ arrivata a da diventare tra i piÃ¹ grandi eventi Europei del settore, con la partecipazione di oltre 3500 atleti. Il campionato italiano a squadre prevede dapprima una selezione a livello provinciale che permetterÃ  alle squadre qualificate di accedere alla finale nazionale nella quale verranno conferiti i titoli di campioni italiani delle cat A-B-C-MIXED.

Campionato Italiano Singolo e Doppio

Ãˆ la piÃ¹ importante manifestazione organizzata della F.I.DART per giocatori singoli con la partecipazione di ca. 1000 atleti. Il campionato italiano Singolo e Doppio prevede la qualificazione per aderire alla finale nazionale nella quale verranno conferiti i titoli di campioni italiani nelle categorie A, B, C, D, Femminile A/B, Femminile C, Femminile D e Under 16. Campionato Provinciale a squadre Il campionato prevede una selezione a livello provinciale che culmina nella finale della medesima circoscrizione nella quale vengo assegnati i titoli di: Campioni provinciali a squadre CAT A-B-C-MIXED. Campioni provinciali individuali CAT A-B-C-D- FEMMINILE. Questo campionato puÃ² vantare la partecipazione di 1000 squadre circa con il coinvolgimento di oltre 9000 atleti.

FIGeST- Federazione Italiana Giochi e Sport Tradizionali

La FIGEeST Ã¨ la DSA che gestisce 19 giochi e sport tradizionali fra i quali il gioco delle freccette che Ã¨ gestito e organizzato dalla F.I.Dart.

E.D.U. â€“ European Dart Union

La F.I.DART con i rispettivi organi sportivi di Germania, Francia, Svizzera, Austria, Spagna, Belgio, Lussemburgo, Polonia, Ungheria, Rep. Ceca, Slovacchia, Slovenia e Croazia, Turchia, formano la E.D.U. (EUROPEAN DART UNION), organizzazione che coordina e gestisce il campionato europeo, evento che viene assegnato a turno alle nazioni partecipanti. I partecipanti a questo campionato maturano una classifica che culmina con lâ€™assegnazione dei vari titoli europei a squadre ed individuali.

I.D.F.- International Dart Federation

A.S.D. F.I.dart Ã¨ membro della I.D.F. organizzazione internazionale che ingloba diverse realtÃ  sportive a livello mondiale, con il fine di organizzare campionati mondiali dello sport freccette.

Bienvenidas a mi instancia personal. Poneos cÃ³modas y seguidme, si os apetece.

Unas notas rÃ¡pidas sobre quÃ© esperar de esto:

  • Nada de lo que aquÃ­ se diga implica una toma de postura, implÃ­cita o explÃ­cita, de quien quiera que me dÃ© dinero a cambio de mi trabajo.
  • Ninguna de la informaciÃ³n que puedas encontrar aquÃ­ debe ser interpretada como una Â«verdad absolutaÂ». Naturalmente, lo que digo se alinea con lo que considero cierto hasta el mÃ¡ximo de mis capacidades. Pero eso no lo hace cierto. Comprueba tus fuentes.
  • No des por hecho que si ves algo aquÃ­ hoy, estarÃ¡ maÃ±ana. Los mensajes tienen un tiempo de vida de dos semanas y desaparecen despuÃ©s. Puedes encontrar algo mÃ¡s permanente en mi blog brucknerite. Pero tampoco te confÃ­es.
  • No es mi intenciÃ³n hacer daÃ±o salvo que especifique lo contrario. Si te has sentido ofendido, lo lamento. Pero la vida va a seguir. LevÃ¡ntate y hazte un cafÃ©, o algo.
  • Pago esto con el dinero que me cuesta mucho ganar. Â¿Haces tÃº lo mismo? Pues eso.
  • Puedo cambiar este texto y las intenciones que lo animan en cualquier momento. Aunque no creo que eso pase.

Description: Another tech-releated Mastodon instance

sciences.social is an online community for social scientists who want to connect with one another and the millions of Mastodon users who have opted for social media that is ad-free and actively moderated to keep bad actors at bay. Here's how to get started.

1. Create an account

Click Create account to get started. You'll be asked to agree to some ground rules. You can post about almost anything on sciences.social, but we don't allow sexism, racism, homophobia, transphobia, casteism or abusive behavior.

Once you confirm your email you'll be online. Come on back to this page (sciences.social/about) for next steps.

2. Get an app

Mastodon works best on phones when you have an app. Ice Cubes for iOS and Tusky for Android are very good and free. Mona and ivory are excellent apps for iOS/Mac users with a few dollars to spare.

Mastodon also works well from a web browser on laptops and desktops. A browser extension like Graze (chrome, mozilla) or FediAct will make following folks from other Mastodon servers seamless.

3. Follow lots of folks

Thousands of social scientists are active on Mastodon. There's no algorithm to fill your feed with content so it helps to follow liberally. Our companion site find.sciences.social makes it easy to find and follow academics from many different disciplines including Sociology, Communication and Media Studies, and Political Science. Followgraph finds folks who are popular among the people you already follow.

You can also follow hashtags like #ASA2023 to see what people are posting about the conference. Or follow #rstats for hints on R. Or maybe just #NaturePhotography for some pleasant views.

4. Start Posting and Boosting

Introduce yourself with your first post, and include an #introduction hashtag. Post about whatever you want, and use hashtags to make finding your posts easier. If you see a post you like, boost it. There's no algorithm to amplify selected voices here so we rely on boosting to see what's interesting.

More about us

sciences.social welcomes all social scientists, including professors, grad students and anyone with a graduate degree in the social sciences (sociology, anthropology, political science, communications, economics...), including people who are doing qualitative and quantitative work inside or outside academia. We want this to be a comfortable place for social scientists from all backgrounds, including those who are from marginalized or racialized groups, sexual minorities, people with disabilities and others who may not feel welcomed in some academic spaces.

sciences.social is collectively funded. It was started by Mark Igra (@markigra), a PhD student who earned enough money to start the site in a previous career. While Mark will continue to ensure sciences.social is funded, donations have helped pay for the rapid growth of the site. We encourage you to donate through our Open Collective fundraising page, which shows all of our spending. Donations through that page are tax deductible for U.S. taxpayers thanks to fiscal hosting from the Open Collective Foundation.

Mark runs this site with the help of a crew of moderators (Pratik, Kristian, Simon and Javier), with valuable advice from folks like Emily and Pamela. Let us know if you would like to help out.

Policies

At the moment, the official rules are deliberately minimal, but they have important implications. First, if you don't understand that "treat people with respect" means no sexism, racism, homophobia, transphobia or casteism and precludes abusive behavior and doxxing, then you don't belong on this site. Second, you must use your real name in your profile and we strongly encourage using your full name as your display name. While there are plenty of good reasons for anonymity on the internet, for our purposes being able to link online reputation to real-world reputation is important.

Post Visibility

Public posts appear on the local timelines and federated timelines of sciences.social and all other mastodon instances that host your followers. Consider using Unlisted for posts you want your followers to see, but would prefer not to appear in public timelines. Using Unlisted for replies is strongly encouraged.

Posts expressing racism, homophobia and the like are not allowed with or without a content warning or with any level of visibility.

Sensitive Media

You must mark media as sensitive if it contains violence or sexual content. We also request that you mark media as sensitive if it might trigger common phobias including arachnophobia (fear of spiders) and Ophidiophobia (fear of snakes).

Getting along

Folks come here from different academic, ethnic and national cultures, so there are likely to be some mismatches in tone when we talk to one another. People might be more blunt than you are used to, or you might think someone is frustratingly obtuse when they are just trying to be polite. It's best to presume that folks here are acting in good faith. Mastodon has good tools for filtering or blocking posts you don't want to see. However, if you think someone is deliberately violating the rules or negatively affecting the community as a whole, you can report them as described below.

Reporting bad behavior

One of the great strengths of Mastodon is the ability to restrict access to bad actors. sciences.social already blocks posts from dozens of sites known to host trolls and nazis, but there'll be other bad behavior. If you use the "Report" action on someone's post the moderators can review it and take action to restrict that account. Reporting helps even for people who make their home on other servers.

Content Warnings

Content warnings are an important part of both the technical infrastructure and the culture of the Mastodon online community. They aren't just used for "triggering" content but also are often treated as a â€œheadlineâ€ that allows people to choose whether they want to read the whole post. Click the CW link on your post to set one.

We strongly encourage the use of content warnings for posts that you think might be triggering or of limited interest, for example mentions of death or violence, and political debates centered on one country or locality.

While expressions of racism, casteism, homophobia, and transphobia are off-limits, we do not require content warnings for posts about those topics and their effects on people, whether academic or otherwise. Use your own judgment about using content warnings on these topics.

Site Visualization

The current header image is a public domain visualization from W.E.B. Du Bois exhibit at the 1900 Paris Exhibition. Expect changing visualizations over time
Short: Non-profit, ad-free social media for social scientists. Join thousands of social scientists here and across the fediverse.

Description:
Welcome to Burnout CafÃ©, where relaxation and rejuvenation meet the perfect cup of coffee. Nestled in a cozy corner of the Internet, Burnout CafÃ© offers a haven for those seeking solace from the daily grind. With a serene ambiance adorned in calming hues, this cafÃ© invites you to unwind, leaving stress at the door.

Burnout CafÃ© encourages daily detox, providing a space where reading and conversation flourish. Whether you're seeking a solo escape or a quiet rendezvous with friends, this haven is designed to be your pause button in a fast-paced world. Step into Burnout CafÃ© and step out refreshed, ready to face the world with renewed energy.
Short: Frankly, We're just too burned out to write a description. You suffering from burnout, too? Come and chill for a while at Burnout CafÃ©. Maybe you'll feel better. Or maybe you won't. Anyway, try it.

Description:
LiYhu Social is the digital crossroads for pioneers of AI-generated art. Our Mastodon server is crafted for an international community that embraces technological advances in art. Here, you can explore the boundaries of digital creativity, share your AI-generated artworks, and discuss the latest innovations with like-minded individuals.

At LiYhu Social, we believe AI-generated art represents a new frontier for creative expression, offering limitless possibilities for artistic exploration. Our platform is a space where artists, technologists, and art lovers can meet, inspire each other, and collaborate on projects that push the boundaries of traditional and digital art.

Join LiYhu Social to be at the forefront of this artistic revolution. Discover virtual art galleries, engage in enriching discussions, and be the first to know about AI art exhibitions and events. Your journey into the world of AI-generated art starts here, at LiYhu Social.
Short: Welcome to LiYhu Social, your hub for AI-generated art. Explore, share, and marvel at digital creativity.

Description:
This instance is a little splashboard in the backyard of a profandom couple. A place for them to post art, rambles, and just microblog without fear of persecution or confrontation.

This instance follows the Three Rules of Fandom.

The instance is not accepting invite requests or join applications, as it is just meant for the family. Please do not attempt to sign up, even if sign-ups are open.

This place is meant to be a safe space for them, to be able to look at things they like while still in the safety of their own home.

Please respect this, and their boundaries.
Short:
A small server that's basically just a corkboard for a really gay profandom couple.
This server stands by profandom rules, such as SALS, DDDR, and experience curation.
Please do not ask for invites.
This server is for the public no holds barded.
Just a small server for my friends and I to use Mastodon!

Description:
Fostering Strong Family Connections

famick.social is an exclusive online community designed to facilitate communication and connection among families. In today's digital landscape, where technology shapes our interactions, famick.social provides a secure and private platform for families to manage various aspects of family life while strengthening their bonds.

Key Features:

  1. Tailored Family Communication: famick.social offers a unique space for family members to connect and communicate. The platform supports both individual and group conversations, enabling families to share updates, engage in discussions, and maintain ongoing dialogues.

  2. Seamless Multimedia Sharing: The platform facilitates easy sharing of photos, videos, and other multimedia content, enabling family members to capture and preserve cherished moments.

  3. Nurturing a Supportive Community: Beyond its family-oriented features, famick.social promotes a positive and supportive community atmosphere. Families can share achievements, address challenges, and provide each other with valuable insights and empathy.

famick.social aims to counter the potential isolation caused by technology by offering a platform that facilitates effective communication, streamlined family interactions, and meaningful engagement. By creating a dedicated space for families to connect, share experiences, and provide mutual support, the platform aims to strengthen family ties and create enduring memories across generations.
Short: A server for families

Description: Une instance perso de bookwyrm.

A mastodon instance for my furry self and my friends. Moderated by me.

All the content on this instance must follow the rules.

Registration is closed, but if you do want to register, please DM me.

This is a very new self-hosted instance and I'm still learning how to administer it. Hopefully it won't disappear any time soon, after all, this is my home now.

Hosted on a OnePlus 6 running mobian linux.
RAM: 8GB
Storage: 100GB

Cloudflare is used as a DNS provider, but proxying is disabled, unless I start getting DoS'ed.

Description:
About zettel.haus

Zettel Haus is a Mastodon instance for linking toots together.

We provide a platform for note-taking. Toots have a character limit of 4096 and can be written in Markdown. Referencing other toots is possible with [Reference](#vcxhj3jx_). We should also support math notation soon.

Literature notes

You can import or write notes during text reading and decomposition at pad.zettel.haus.

Folgezettel, follow-ups

Replying to a toot is a simple, yet effective method for following up on a note.
Short: Hello! zettel.haus provides linked and collaborative note-taking via tooting

Vaikka Hotspotin taustat ovat tiukasti koirissa, niin koiranomistajat ovat kiinnostuneita muistakin asioista. Siksi niin foorumi kuin Mastodon-alusta tÃ¤Ã¤llÃ¤ ovat auki mitÃ¤ moninaisemmille aiheille.

Vapaus tuo vastuuta

Se, ettÃ¤ Hotspot on yleiskanava, ei kuitenkaan tarkoita, ettÃ¤ ihan mitÃ¤ tahansa saa huudella. Siksi on olemassa pelisÃ¤Ã¤nnÃ¶t. Itseasiassa tiedÃ¤t tÃ¤mÃ¤n kaiken, mutta kerrataan kuitenkin.

KÃ¤yttÃ¤ydy kuten aikuisten kuuluu

Sinulla saa olla omituinen huumorintaju, mutta sitÃ¤ ei voi kÃ¤yttÃ¤Ã¤ tekosyynÃ¤ heittÃ¤Ã¤ ihan mitÃ¤ tahansa kenen tahansa silmille. Voit myÃ¶s kiihtyÃ¤, mutta et menettÃ¤Ã¤ hallintaa. Joskus voi harmittaa, mutta uhriutuminen on pÃ¤Ã¤sÃ¤Ã¤ntÃ¶isesti aina vain sÃ¤Ã¤littÃ¤vÃ¤Ã¤. Ja riidan haastaminen on typerÃ¤Ã¤ ravintolan sulkemisajan jÃ¤lkeen nakkikioskin jonossa, ja tÃ¤Ã¤llÃ¤ aina kellonajasta piittaamatta.

Jos postauksestasi, tai kommenteista, ensimmÃ¤inen muille tuleva tunne on myÃ¶tÃ¤hÃ¤peÃ¤ teiniangstista, niin moposi keuli ja ehkÃ¤ kannattaa pitÃ¤Ã¤ hieman taukoa.

Aikuisuus tarkoittaa myÃ¶s sitÃ¤, ettÃ¤ tÃ¤mÃ¤ on aikuisille suunnattu alusta. Saisit olla tÃ¤ysi-ikÃ¤inen, mutta aivan samoin kuin osa aikuisista ei osaa kÃ¤yttÃ¤ytyÃ¤ kuin aikuiset, niin osa nuorista osaa kÃ¤yttÃ¤ytyÃ¤ (sekÃ¤ ajatella ja ilmaista itseÃ¤Ã¤n) paremmin kuin mitÃ¤ tÃ¤ysi-ikÃ¤iset. Mutta sisÃ¤ltÃ¶ tuskin sopii alle 16 vuotiaille.

Jos olet nuori, niin tuo se esille tavalla tai toisella. IkÃ¤ ei todellakaan ole synti, mutta kokemuksesta ja joskus myÃ¶s tiedoista voi uupua. LÃ¤htÃ¶kohtaisesti jokaiseen suhtaudutaan kuin aikuiseen, joten tieto siitÃ¤, ettÃ¤ olet vielÃ¤ alaikÃ¤inen, helpottaa joustavampaa suhtautumista.

Kiihkoile jossain muualla

Voit uskoa salaliittoihin, poliittiseen populismiin, ihmisrotujen erilaisuuksiin, uskontosi kaikkivoipaisuuteen, taikauskon kÃ¤yttÃ¶Ã¶n lÃ¤Ã¤kkeenÃ¤ tai oman parisuhteesi ehdottomuuteen â€” mutta et tÃ¤Ã¤llÃ¤. Tai ainakaan et saarnaa moisista. Itseasiassa on parempi,ettÃ¤ olet hiljaa. Tai vielÃ¤ parempi on, ettÃ¤ et kirjaudu tÃ¤nne ollenkaan.

YllÃ¤oidolla on nollatoleranssi Ã¤Ã¤riajatteluun ja vihapuheeseen.

SpÃ¤mmin ja jakamisen ero

Jos julkaiset pelkÃ¤n mainoksen, niin peli puhalletaan samantien poikki. Ã„lÃ¤kÃ¤ kuvittele sekuntiakaan, ettÃ¤ yllÃ¤pito ei tunnista tekstimainosta tai vaikuttamisyritystÃ¤.

Tuo ei tietenkÃ¤Ã¤n tarkoita sitÃ¤, ettÃ¤ linkkejÃ¤ kaupallisiin suuntiin ei saisi jakaa. Tietysti saa, kunhan se liittyy vaikka kysymykseen.

Jos haluat pÃ¤ivitellÃ¤ tai naureskella vaikka epÃ¤toivoisia mainoksia, niin jaa kuvakaappaus. Ã„lÃ¤ palkitse huijaavia yrittÃ¤jiÃ¤ tarjoamalla suoran linkin heidÃ¤n kassasivulleen.

Alaston vÃ¤kivalta

Hotspot ei ole hotlips, tai ajo-ohje g-pisteeseen. Alastomuus ja seksuaalisuus ovat sallittuja, ja mukavina asioina omalla tavallaan jopa haluttuja (pun not intended), mutta se ei tarkoita puhtaan pornon jakamista. Se tarjonta lÃ¶ytynee muualtakin, joten ei lÃ¤hdetÃ¤ siihen suuntaan.

Melkoinen osa Mastodon-instansseista, jopa kotimaiset, kieltÃ¤vÃ¤t aika ehdottomasti alastomuuden, seksin ja pornon, mutta sallivat helpommin vÃ¤kivallan. Hotspoton yllÃ¤pito ei ymmÃ¤rrÃ¤ tuota ja nÃ¤keekin asian juurikin pÃ¤invastoin. VÃ¤kivaltaakin saa nÃ¤kyÃ¤, mutta sen muuttuessa itseisarvoksi hallinnollinen vastustus on tiukempaa ja nopeampaa kuin nÃ¤nneissÃ¤, kiveksissÃ¤ ja paljaassa ihossa.

KÃ¤ytÃ¤ sisÃ¤lÃ¶varoitusta, mieluummin hieman liian ahkerasti kuin harvakseltaan. Ihan siksi, ettÃ¤ he, jotka eivÃ¤t hÃ¤tkÃ¤hdÃ¤, osaavat asetuksista kiertÃ¤Ã¤ moisen, mutta muut saavat hieman harkinta-aikaa sille mitÃ¤ nÃ¤kevÃ¤t.

Suomea Suomessa

Tuo oli demonstraatio ilmaisusta, joka ylittÃ¤Ã¤ helposti Ã¤Ã¤ripuheen rajan. Aidosti tarkoitus oli sanoa, ettÃ¤ lÃ¤hes jokainen suomalainen osaa suomea, mutta ruotsi, saame ja sen eri murteet, romanikieli, karjalankieli jne. ovatkin jo paljon heikommissa kantimissa. Jopa englanninkielen taito on paljon heikommissa kantimissa kuin mitÃ¤ annetaan ymmÃ¤rtÃ¤Ã¤.

Joten kirjoitetaan Hotspotin paikallisella aikajanalla suomea.

Tuo ei ole aivan ehdoton sÃ¤Ã¤ntÃ¶, koska joskus englanniksi lÃ¶ytyy joku tÃ¤ydellisen maukas meemi tai lainaus. Mutta pyri minimoimaan vieraat kielet ja jos tilaa riittÃ¤Ã¤, niin laita suomennos. Tai voit julkaista saman sisÃ¤llÃ¶n myÃ¶s foorumilla ja linkittÃ¤Ã¤ kÃ¤Ã¤nnÃ¶s Hotspotin julkaisuusi.

Jos sinulla on jokin perusteltu syy tehdÃ¤ postaus asia-aiheessa vaikka englanniksi, niin sinulla on kaksi vaihtoehtoa:

  • merkitse julkaisusi listaamattomaksi, jolloin se nÃ¤kyy vain seuraajillasi, mutta ei ilmesty julkiseen syÃ¶tteeseen
  • kysy yllÃ¤pidon mielipidettÃ¤ ja lupaa

Vaatimus suomenkielestÃ¤ ei tietenkÃ¤Ã¤n koskea vastauksia sellaisille seuraamillesi henkilÃ¶ille, jotka julkaisevat muualla kuin Hotspotissa. Sama vapaus koskee buustaamisia.

Moderointi ei ole keskusteltavissa

YllÃ¤pidon moderointipÃ¤Ã¤tÃ¶kset ovat lopullisia eikÃ¤ niistÃ¤ voi valittaa. Vinkua voi, mutta jossain muualla. Sama koskee sÃ¤Ã¤ntÃ¶jÃ¤ (ellet keksi jotain kiihkotonta ja pÃ¤tevÃ¤Ã¤ perustelua). YllÃ¤pito ei myÃ¶skÃ¤Ã¤n pÃ¤Ã¤sÃ¤Ã¤ntÃ¶isesti keskustele toiminnastaan.

Ohjeet, neuvot ja vinkit

Googlella lÃ¶ydÃ¤t jonkun verrankin ohjeita miten Mastodonia ja hajautettua somea kÃ¤ytetÃ¤Ã¤n. Mutta foorumilla kertyy enemmÃ¤nkin ohjeita ja vinkkejÃ¤.

Katiskan Meta-foorumi on muutoinkin Hotspotin erÃ¤Ã¤nlainen isÃ¤ntÃ¤, eli tiepdtukset, virhetilanteet jne. kÃ¤sitellÃ¤Ã¤n siellÃ¤. Joten sinnekin liittyminen on akselia hyvÃ¤t ideat.

Sinun kannattaa ottaa seurantaan @admin YllÃ¤pito ei harrasta yllÃ¤pidon tilillÃ¤ mikrobloggaamista, vaan julkaisee siellÃ¤ vaikka juurikin oleellisia yllÃ¤pidollisia tietoja.

Taloudelliset kytkÃ¶kset ja sidonnaisuudet

Hotspot, kuten ylipÃ¤Ã¤tÃ¤Ã¤n Katiskaan liittyvÃ¤t sivustot, maksetaan yllÃ¤pidon omasta taskusta. YhteistyÃ¶sopimuksia ei ole, mutta jos kiinnostaa, niin tarjoa. SisÃ¤ltÃ¶ ja hallinta ei kuitenkaan moisesta muuttuisi.

Joten kyseessÃ¤ on yksityisihmisen projekti, ei muuta.

Description:
ÏƒĞ¼Î¹ĞºÑÏƒĞ¸-Î±â„“ÏĞ½Î± Space Interconnection (Omikron-Alpha Space Interconnection) is a free and public Mastodon Instance, running on a Root Server,located in Frankfurt, Germany. This Instance is not exlusively dedicated to a single theme, but it heavily encourages creativity in all means, let it be photography, virtual or physical projects. Examples would be showing your newest music compositions, artworks or self-built robot that will destroy the world next week (please don't do this). This Server stands for free speech and open-mindness.

Since we want to keep this server a comfortable place, clean and fresh, we will enforce the server rules no matter what. Depending on the severity when breaking the rules, you will get 2 warnings. The third will be a permanent ban.

Posting anything illegal or trying to get access to any places on the server that you did not excplicitly receive permissions for will lead to a police report and a permanent ban from the server and our network.

Administrator and Owner of the Server is Featherus@mastodon.omikron-alpha.net, reachable over the E-Mail address admin(at)omikron-alpha.net

Server Infrastructure: The Server is secured against DDOS attacks by its hoster, furthermore it is using extensive security mechanisms to be as secure as possible. In case you cannot reach the server anymore and haven't done anything wrong, please report to admin(at)omikron-alpha.net

--IMPORTANT-- The Full Server is backed up to a different location once every month, at the first day of the month at approx. 12PM GMT+2.00 (Berlin). Therefore, this instance is not reachable for ~1 hour at this time.

Description:
Academia Pub is a Fediverse server for verified academics at educational and research institutions. It is intended for public discourse on general or technical topics.

Funding

To provide highly responsive servers and moderation, Academia Pub will be a paid service, after starting with a 6 month free trial.

Academia Pub is Not

This is not:

  1. a "free speech" instance where anything can be posted regardless of harm
  2. an instancce for researching or interacting with bad actors of the Fediverse

Image Credits

The default avatar is a photo by Wikipedia user, Another Believer, and is of the Alma Mater sculpture. It is used under the Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 3.0 Unported license and has been cropped to fit the avatar shape.
Short: Academia Pub is a Fediverse server for verified academics at educational and research institutions.

Description:
Users of this Mastodon server are the band Club of Tone, the members individually (voluntary) and their staff members (voluntary). Even if not everyone can register here, you can reach us everywhere via Mastodon or the Fediverse.

The costs of this Mastodon server are paid by Thomas Alexander Kolbe (member in Club of Tone). This server is a virtual machine. Server location is Frankfurt/Germany, hosted by IONOS. Technology is the Glitch-Edition of Mastodon.

Our band members and their staff are committed to equal treatment for all. We have a heart for the LGBTQIA+ community. We are committed to equality for women. The protection of children and vulnerable people is also a high priority for us. We behave accordingly in the Fediverse and on social networks in general.

We come from Japan and Germany. Both countries are democratic. We stand on the ground of the constitutions of our two countries.

Even though our Mastodon server is exclusively available to us, we have set ourselves behaviors to prevent FOMO, platform guidelines and rules of use, which you can read below.

A FOMO-Free Zone

At Club of Tone Mastodon Server, we aim to foster an environment that does not promote FOMO (Fear of Missing Out) behavior among our followers. We believe in creating a space where individuals can engage with our content without feeling pressured or anxious about missing out on updates or announcements.

FOMO refers to the feeling of anxiety or unease that arises from the fear of missing out on exciting events, experiences, or opportunities. In the context of social media, it often manifests when users compare their own lives to the seemingly more exciting or fulfilling experiences shared by others.

Our goal is to provide a welcoming and inclusive community where members can participate at their own pace and feel supported in their interactions. We encourage meaningful engagement and value quality over quantity in our content sharing practices.

By fostering a culture of respect, collaboration, and authenticity, we aim to minimize the impact of FOMO and create a positive experience for all members of our Mastodon community.

Platform Guidelines

1. Respectful Communication:

  • Treat all members with respect and kindness.
  • Avoid inflammatory language, personal attacks, or harassment of any kind.
  • Engage in constructive discussions and debates without resorting to hostility.

2. Content Guidelines:

  • Share content related to Club of Tone, including music releases, behind-the-scenes insights, and updates.
  • Refrain from posting irrelevant or off-topic content.
  • Ensure that all content shared complies with copyright laws and respects intellectual property rights.

3. Privacy and Confidentiality:

  • Respect the privacy of fellow members and refrain from sharing personal information without consent.
  • Do not share confidential or proprietary information related to Club of Tone without authorization.

4. Community Safety:

  • Report any instances of harassment, abuse, or inappropriate behavior to the moderators.
  • Do not engage in or promote illegal activities on the platform.
  • Foster a safe and inclusive environment for all members.

5. Moderation and Enforcement:

  • Moderators have the authority to enforce these guidelines and take appropriate action against violations.
  • Members who repeatedly violate guidelines may face warnings, temporary suspension, or permanent removal from the server.
  • Moderation decisions are final and not open to debate on the platform.

6. Collaboration and Support:

  • Encourage collaboration, creativity, and support among members of Club of Tone.
  • Share resources, feedback, and encouragement to help fellow members thrive in their artistic endeavors.
  • Celebrate achievements and milestones within the community.

By adhering to these guidelines, we can maintain a positive and respectful environment on the Club of Tone Mastodon server. Thank you for your cooperation and contribution to our community!
Short: Users of this Mastodon server are the band Club of Tone, the members individually (voluntary) and their staff members (voluntary).

Description:
English

Take back your power and agency to act using encryption, distributed computing and digital anonymity.
Monero and Tor/I2P networks are the main tools of this trade.
Monero ends the state's control over the money and makes it powerless to collect involuntary taxes, while Tor/I2P makes it unavailable to get a hang on what its "subjects" are up to.

Turkce

Bireysel etkinligini ve gucunu dijital sifreleme, anonimlik ve dagitik bilgisayar aglari ile geri al.
Bu yolda Monero ve Tor/I2P aglari ana aletler.
Monero hukumetin para uzerindeki hakimiyetini sona erdirip sorumsuzca vergilendirilmeyi sona erdirirken Tor/I2P onun "hukmettigi" kitlelerin neyin pesinde oldugunu anlamasini imkansizlastirir.
Yozlasmis hukumet yapilarini kor ve kolsuz et!

Mastodon.Eskimo.Com is run by Eskimo North, an Internet hosting, shell access, mail, vps, ssh company.  Check us out https://www.eskimo.com/

Description: Personal Instance

Our goals

We believe in the power of building intentional, friendly communities of limited scale. We're committed to not building any super-sized instances, but building sustainable services we're people can make real connections, while still being able to engage with the broader fediverse.

We want the Fediverse to be much more than Mastodon, and so will work to provide additional services and put effort into integrating them.

Funding

Stad is a commercial enterprise, and is intended to be self-sustaining by membership fees covering operations, moderation, and hopefully also to help fund services we rely on. Our members will pay for participation in a cohesive community extending past Mastodon and to other services.

We're anticipating charging ~$5/month for Stad membership, of which our Mastodon will be one element.

We strongly value the many voluntary Mastodon instances, and hope that once we're self-sustaining we'll be able to contribute.

Launch

We're not yet ready. You'll see our site evolve in the open for a while before we'll launch. No date has been set.

Can I pre-register?

Not yet. If you really badly want to be notified when we go live, DM @stad@stad.social or e-mail contact@stad.social.
Short: A friendly Mastodon community. We've not yet opened. If you want an account, keep an eye on stad.social - Membership of Stad, giving access to our Mastodon, will cost $5/month
